output: 缺乏实地观察限制了我们对此的了解，但已知种内冲突有时会导致伤害乃至死亡。尖嘴鹳科（Anhimidae）、某些秧鸡（"Jacana"、"Hydrophasianus"）、刺翅鹅（"Plectropterus"）、激流鸭（"Merganetta"）及九种麦鸡（"Vanellus"）利用翅膀上的尖刺作为武器。蒸汽鸭（"Tachyeres"）、鹅和天鹅（"Anserinae"）、独行鸟（"Pezophaps"）、鞘嘴鸥（"Chionis"）、一些冠雉（"Crax"）和石鸻（"Burhinus"）则利用翼梢的骨突来冲击和敲打对手。"Actophilornis"和"Irediparra"这两种秧鸡拥有扩展的、类似刀片的桡骨。已灭绝的"Xenicibis"具有独特的延长前肢和巨大的手部，这可能在战斗或防御时用作关节棍棒或连枷。例如，天鹅保护蛋或幼崽时，可能会利用骨刺进行攻击并啄咬敌手。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Like the HTTP cookie, a flash cookie (also known as a "Local Shared Object") can be used to save application data. Flash cookies are not shared across domains. An August 2009 study by the Ashkan Soltani and a team of researchers at UC Berkeley found that 50% of websites using Flash were also employing flash cookies, yet privacy policies rarely disclosed them, and user controls for privacy preferences were lacking. Most browsers' cache and history suppress or delete functions did not affect Flash Player's writing Local Shared Objects to its own cache in version 10.2 and earlier, at which point the user community was much less aware of the existence and function of Flash cookies than HTTP cookies. Thus, users with those versions, having deleted HTTP cookies and purged browser history files and caches, may believe that they have purged all tracking data from their computers when in fact Flash browsing history remains. Adobe's own Flash Website Storage Settings panel, a submenu of Adobe's Flash Settings Manager web application, and other editors and toolkits can manage settings for and delete Flash Local Shared Objects.
output: 与HTTP cookie一样，Flash cookie（亦称“本地共享对象”）可用于保存应用数据。Flash cookie不会跨域共享。2009年8月，Ashkan Soltani和加州大学伯克利分校的研究团队发现，在使用Flash技术的网站中，50%的网站同时使用了Flash cookie。然而，隐私政策很少提及此事，用户对隐私设定的控制也不到位。在10.2及之前的版本中，大部分浏览器的缓存和历史清除功能并不影响Flash Player将本地共享对象写入其自身的缓存，这导致当时的用户对Flash cookie的认识和理解远不及HTTP cookie。因此，那些版本的用户即便删除了HTTP cookies并清空了浏览器历史与缓存，可能仍会误以为他们已经完全清除了计算机中的所有追踪数据，但实际上Flash浏览历史还残留着。Adobe的Flash网站存储设置面板，作为Adobe Flash设置管理器网页应用的一个子菜单，以及其他的编辑工具和工具包均可用于管理和删除Flash本地共享对象的设置。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The topography of China has been divided by the Chinese government into five homogeneous physical macro-regions, namely Eastern China (subdivided into the northeast plain, north plain, and southern hills), Xinjiang-Mongolia, and the Tibetan highlands. It is diverse with snow-capped mountains, deep river valleys, broad basins, high plateaus, rolling plains, terraced hills, sandy dunes with many other geographic features and other landforms present in myriad variations. In general, the land is high in the west and descends to the east coast. Mountains (33 percent), plateaus (26 percent) and hills (10 percent) account for nearly 70 percent of the country's land surface. Most of the country's arable land and population are based in lowland plains (12 percent) and basins (19 percent), though some of the greatest basins are filled with deserts. The country's rugged terrain presents problems for the construction of overland transportation infrastructure and requires extensive terracing to sustain agriculture, but is conducive to the development of forestry, mineral and hydropower resources, as well as tourism in the country.
output: 中国的地形被政府划分为五大相似的自然区域，分别是东部地区（进一步划分为东北平原、华北平原和南部山区）、新疆-内蒙古地区和西藏高原。该地区地貌多样，拥有雪山、深谷、宽阔盆地、高原、起伏平原、梯田、沙丘等众多地理特征和地形。总体上，该国西部地势较高，向东部海岸线逐渐降低。山地（占总面积的33%）、高原（26%）和丘陵（10%）共占国土面积近70%。国内大部分耕地和人口集中在低地平原（占12%）和盆地（占19%）；然而一些大盆地中存在沙漠。复杂多变的地形给交通基础设施的建设带来了挑战，需要大量建设梯田以支持农业发展，同时这也促进了林业、矿业和水电资源的开发，以及国家旅游业的发展。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: In a 1965 letter to his friend Paul Semonin, Thompson explained an affection for the Industrial Workers of the World, "I have in recent months come to have a certain feeling for Joe Hill and the Wobbly crowd who, if nothing else, had the right idea. But not the right mechanics. I believe the IWW was probably the last human concept in American politics." In another letter to Semonin, Thompson wrote that he agreed with Karl Marx, and compared him to Thomas Jefferson. In a letter to William Kennedy, Thompson confided that he was "coming to view the free enterprise system as the single greatest evil in the history of human savagery." In the documentary "Breakfast with Hunter", Hunter S. Thompson is seen in several scenes wearing different Che Guevara T-shirts. Additionally, actor and friend Benicio del Toro has stated that Thompson kept a "big" picture of Che in his kitchen. Thompson wrote on behalf of African-American rights and the civil rights movement. He strongly criticized the dominance in American society of what he called "white power structures".
output: 在1965年给他朋友保罗·塞蒙宁的信中，汤普森分享了他对世界产业工人的钟爱，“近些月来，我对乔·希尔和那批乌合之众产生了某种情感，他们至少抱持着正确的理念，但方法却不对。我认为，IWW可能是美国政治中最后的人文理念。” 在另一封信给塞蒙宁的信中，汤普森表示他赞同卡尔·马克思的思想，并将他与托马斯·杰斐逊相比较。在写给威廉·肯尼迪的信中，汤普森坦言他“开始视自由企业制度为人类历史上最大的邪恶之一。” 在纪录片《与亨特共进早餐》中，可以看到亨特·S·汤普森多次穿着切·格瓦拉的T恤。此外，他的朋友及演员本尼西奥·德尔·托罗提到，汤普森在他厨房中挂着一幅“大型”的切的照片。汤普森撰写过多篇支持非裔美国人权利和民权运动的文章。他强烈批评了他所指的美国社会中“白人权力结构”的主导作用。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I ordered the Pink Queen Bikini Set and absolutely loved it. The swimsuit looks just like the photos online and the material was thick, quality and strong-feeling. With such a light-colored top, I worry that swimsuits will appear see-through against my skin tone, but this one had bra padding and was layered and thick enough so that even the cream color did not show my skin. I found the bottoms to be true to size based on the sizing chart but did find that the bandeau top was a little bigger than my frame. However, the adjustable straps came in handy and were so convenient when I wanted to make the top fit better or just take the straps off completely.— Madison Yerke, digital content strategist
output: 我购买了粉红女王比基尼套装，非常喜爱。这套泳衣的外观与网络图片完全相符，材料厚重、优质且结实。由于上衣颜色较浅，我本担心穿上后可能会有透视的情况，但这套泳衣配有内嵌胸垫，并且层数充足、厚实，即使是奶油色也完全不透肤色。我发现根据尺码表，下装尺寸非常准确，但上身的无带式设计对我略大。尽管如此，可调节肩带非常实用，无论是调整上衣更贴合还是完全去掉肩带时都显得十分便利。— 麦迪逊·耶克，数字内容策略师

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: A lesbian is a homosexual woman or girl. The word is also used for women in relation to their sexual identity or sexual behavior, regardless of sexual orientation, or as an adjective to characterize or associate nouns with female homosexuality or same-sex attraction. The concept of "lesbian" to differentiate women with a shared sexual orientation evolved in the 20th century. Throughout history, women have not had the same freedom or independence as men to pursue homosexual relationships, but neither have they met the same harsh punishment as gay men in some societies. Instead, lesbian relationships have often been regarded as harmless, unless a participant attempts to assert privileges traditionally enjoyed by men. As a result, little in history was documented to give an accurate description of how female homosexuality was expressed. When early sexologists in the late 19th century began to categorize and describe homosexual behavior, hampered by a lack of knowledge about homosexuality or women's sexuality, they distinguished lesbians as women who did not adhere to female gender roles. They classified them as mentally ill—a designation which has been reversed since the late 20th century in the global scientific community.
output: 女同性恋是指女性或女孩中的同性恋者。这个词也用来指涉她们的性身份或性行为，不论她们的性取向如何，亦可作为形容词用以描述或与女同性恋或同性吸引相关联的名词。在20世纪，人们开始用“女同性恋”这一概念来区分有着共同性取向的女性。历史上，女性追求同性恋关系的自由或独立程度并不及男性，但她们在某些社会中也未受到如同性恋男性那样的严厉处罚。通常情况下，女同性恋关系被视作无害，除非参与者试图争取男性所传统享有的权利。因此，历史文献中很少有记录能准确描述女性同性恋如何表示。19世纪末，早期性学家在分类及描述同性恋行为时，由于对同性恋或女性性行为知之甚少，他们将那些不符合女性性别角色的女性界定为女同性恋，并将她们归类为精神病患者——这一分类自20世纪末起在全球科学界已被纠正。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: It is safe tennis. You don’t hit flat shots which have a high risk factor of either going into the net or sailing wide. You don’t look to clear the net by simply a few inches. You play to clear the net by a good few feet. To do that, you have to usually hit constant top spin shots. They sail up above the net, but also come falling down fast after that reach the high point. This either adds depth to a shot, or simply makes the ball bounce high if it lands short. In either scenario, the trajectory of the ball is difficult to tackle, especially because it is not the usual way the ball comes back to a player.
output: 这是一种安全的网球打法。你不会打平直球，这类球容易打网或打出界，风险很高。你也不会试图仅让球越过网几英寸。相反，你应确保球至少越过网几英尺。为了做到这一点，你通常需要打出持续的上旋球。这些球在网上方飞行，但在达到高点后会迅速下坠。这不仅可以增加击球深度，还可以使球在落地时跳得较高，无论是哪种情况，球的飞行轨迹都难以应对，特别是因为它不是球员通常接球的方式。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: In Europe, rates of tuberculosis began to rise in the early 1600s to a peak level in the 1800s, when it caused nearly 25% of all deaths. In the 18th and 19th century, tuberculosis had become epidemic in Europe, showing a seasonal pattern. Tuberculosis caused widespread public concern in the 19th and early 20th centuries as the disease became common among the urban poor. In 1815, one in four deaths in England was due to "consumption". By 1918, TB still caused one in six deaths in France. After TB was determined to be contagious, in the 1880s, it was put on a notifiable-disease list in Britain; campaigns started to stop people from spitting in public places, and the infected poor were "encouraged" to enter sanatoria that resembled prisons (the sanatoria for the middle and upper classes offered excellent care and constant medical attention). Whatever the benefits of the "fresh air" and labor in the sanatoria, even under the best conditions, 50% of those who entered died within five years ( 1916).
output: 在欧洲，结核病的发病率从17世纪初开始上升，并在19世纪达到高峰，那时几乎有25%的死亡率与此病相关。18世纪和19世纪期间，结核病在欧洲爆发成流行病，并呈现出明显的季节性规律。到了19世纪及20世纪初，随着该病在城市贫民中的广泛传播，社会上对此产生了极大的关注。1815年，英格兰有四分之一的死亡案例归因于“肺痨”。到1918年，结核病在法国的死亡比例仍占六分之一。在1880年代确定结核病具有传染性后，英国将其列入传染病通报名单；开始倡导人们不要在公共场所吐痰，并“鼓励”被感染的贫困人群进入类似监狱的疗养院（相对而言，中上阶级的疗养院提供了优越的护理和持续的医疗关注）。尽管疗养院提供“新鲜空气”及劳动所带来的种种益处，即便在最佳环境下，1916年入住疗养院的患者中仍有50%在五年内去世。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The misuse of deepfake technology by malicious actors poses a potential threat to nations, societies, and individuals. However, existing methods for detecting deepfakes primarily focus on uncompressed videos, such as noise characteristics, local textures, or frequency statistics. When applied to compressed videos, these methods experience a decrease in detection performance and are less suitable for real-world scenarios. In this paper, we propose a deepfake video detection method based on 3D spatiotemporal trajectories. Specifically, we utilize a robust 3D model to construct spatiotemporal motion features, integrating feature details from both 2D and 3D frames to mitigate the influence of large head rotation angles or insufficient lighting within frames. Furthermore, we separate facial expressions from head movements and design a sequential analysis method based on phase space motion trajectories to explore the feature differences between genuine and fake faces in deepfake videos. We conduct extensive experiments to validate the performance of our proposed method on several compressed deepfake benchmarks. The robustness of the well-designed features is verified by calculating the consistent distribution of facial landmarks before and after video compression.Our method yields satisfactory results and showcases its potential for practical applications.
output: 深度伪造技术被恶意使用者滥用，对国家、社会和个体构成了潜在威胁。然而，当前检测深度伪造的方法主要针对未压缩视频，诸如噪声特性、局部纹理或频率统计等。当用于压缩视频时，这些方法的检测性能有所下降，不完全适合现实场景。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于三维时空轨迹的深度伪造视频检测方法。具体来说，我们利用一个高效的三维模型构建时空运动特征，融合二维和三维帧的特征细节，以降低大幅度头部转动或帧内光照不足的影响。此外，我们分离了面部表情与头部动作，并设计了一种基于相空间运动轨迹的序列分析方法，探索深度伪造视频中真实面孔与伪造面孔的特征差异。我们进行了广泛的实验，以验证我们提出的方法在各种压缩深度伪造样本上的性能。通过计算视频压缩前后面部标记点的一致性分布，证实了特征设计的稳健性。我们的方法获得了令人满意的效果，显示出其在实际应用中的广泛潜力。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The remake of which was supposed to be released on December 18 of this year, but, due to the pandemic, has been pushed back to October of next year. December 18 of this year is the last day of school before Christmas break for me and the kids. For the last five years, my wife has been buying me movie tickets for a date night for just us to a movie of my choice at the fancy 21+ movie theater in town… the theater with love seats instead of regular seats, and a bar in the back, and the best accommodation of all: no teenagers. We’ve seen some of the new Star Wars movies and the re-release of Titanic this way. It’s the only thing that gets me into a theater anymore… not the movies, but the date night with my wife.
output: 该片原本预定于今年12月18日上映，但因疫情影响，上映日期已推迟至明年10月。对我和孩子们来说，今年的12月18日是圣诞假期前的最后一个上学日。过去五年里，我的妻子一直会在镇上那家专为成人设计的豪华影院为我们买电影票，享受二人世界的约会之夜——这家影院配备了情侣座椅而非普通座位，影院后部还设有酒吧，最大的亮点是：没有青少年。我们就是这样看过一些《星球大战》新片和《泰坦尼克号》的重映版。现在，唯一能吸引我去电影院的，不是电影本身，而是与妻子共度的这些特别约会之夜。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I can't say enough good things about this suit, which I've had for over a year now. Finding a bikini that properly fits my larger chest (I’m a 32H) is one of my life’s biggest struggles, but because of the billowing fabric, the top miraculously covers and fits everything. I got a medium in both the top and bottom and I never once worry about popping out. It's completely family-friendly. I'm at the point now that when I want a truly comfortable bikini, this is the one I always reach for. — Rachel Lubitz, former senior lifestyle editor
output: 我对这套泳衣赞不绝口，已经穿了一年多。对于我这样胸围较大的人（我是32H），找到合适的比基尼一直是一大挑战，但这款泳衣的顶部因为有蓬松的布料设计，竟然奇迹般地既遮盖又合身。我上衣和下衣都选的是中号，穿着它我从未担心过走光。它完全符合家庭友好标准。现在每当我想要一件真正舒适的比基尼时，我总是首选这一款。— Rachel Lubitz，前高级生活方式编辑。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: That’s why you see in most of his races it seems like he accelerates in the last 40 m and then does a sort of victory dance in the last 20m. His acceleration is an illusion. He isn’t accelerating; the others are decelerating. Right around the 50m mark, everyone reaches their top speed, including Bolt. Around the 60m mark, everyone else slows down while Bolt keeps going. Right around the 80m mark, Bolt realizes that everyone else has dropped behind and he starts slowing down. It is possible that he can continue at the same pace for longer than 80m, but he doesn’t really need to.
output: 这就是为什么在他大部分比赛中，你似乎总能看到他在最后40米加速，接着在最后20米跳起胜利之舞。其实这种加速只是一种错觉。他并没有真的加速；而是其他人开始减速了。在50米标志时，包括博尔特在内的每个人都达到了他们的最高速度。到了60米时，其他选手逐渐减慢了速度，但博尔特依然保持原速前进。到了80米时，博尔特察觉到其他选手已经落后，于是开始放慢速度。尽管他有能力维持更长距离的同样速度，但实际上并无必要持续这么做。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I ordered both shoes in shades of green: Faded Lime from Birkenstock and Fluorescent Green from Funkymonkey. Like any connoisseur, if you know your Birks, you would be aware that nearly all the EVA options are monochromatic, so it’s obvious with the Funkymonkey’s white buckles that they are not the originals. Other than that, at first glance, you’ll have a hard time telling these sandals apart. They both have a double buckle, they’re both crafted from the same lightweight EVA material and they both have moldable footpads with what looks to be the same raised arch support on the footbeds (more on this below).
output: 我在 Birkenstock 和 Funkymonkey 两家店分别购买了两种绿色调的鞋：Birkenstock 的是褪色青柠色，Funkymonkey 的则是荧光绿。作为鞋类鉴赏家，如果你熟悉 Birks，你应该知道它们的 EVA 系列基本都是单一色彩的。因此，Funkymonkey 鞋上的白色扣子清楚地显示这不是原版。除此之外，乍一看，这两双凉鞋很难区分开来。它们都采用双扣设计，使用同样的轻质 EVA 材质，并且都配有可塑性脚垫，脚床上看似拥有相同的升高拱形支撑（后文将详细说明）。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Humans love sour tastes, too. A sour taste often indicates the presence of ascorbic acid — vitamin C, which humans have evolved an inability to make in their own bodies (a trait they inherited from their proto-ape ancestors, and also share with tarsiers, other monkeys and apes, guinea pigs, capybaras, and some bats). I mention tarsiers because some people have tried to imply that this indicates an herbivorous or frugivorous diet, but it is just a holdover from a prior species that was frugivorous. Tarsiers are pretty strict insectivores — carnivores, not omnivores like us. So lacking the ability to make vitamin C says nothing about our diet.
output: 人类同样喜欢酸味。酸味通常意味着含有抗坏血酸——即维生素C，而人类由于进化的原因，已失去了自身合成维生素C的能力（这一特征是从其始祖类灵长类动物那里继承而来，眼镜猴、其他各类猴子和猿、豚鼠、水豚以及某些蝙蝠也有同样的特征）。之所以提到眼镜猴，是因为有人曾暗示这可能表示它们是草食性或果食性，但实际上这仅是一种从其果食性前身物种遗传下来的特征。眼镜猴其实是严格的昆虫食性动物——属于肉食者，而非像我们人类这样的杂食者。因此，人类缺乏合成维生素C的能力，并不能说明我们的饮食习性。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The key factor in implementing machine learning algorithms in decision-making situations is not only the accuracy of the model but also its confidence level. The confidence level of a model in a classification problem is often given by the output vector of a softmax function for convenience. However, these values are known to deviate significantly from the actual expected model confidence. This problem is called model calibration and has been studied extensively. One of the simplest techniques to tackle this task is focal loss, a generalization of cross-entropy by introducing one positive parameter. Although many related studies exist because of the simplicity of the idea and its formalization, the theoretical analysis of its behavior is still insufficient. In this study, our objective is to understand the behavior of focal loss by reinterpreting this function geometrically. Our analysis suggests that focal loss reduces the curvature of the loss surface in training the model. This indicates that curvature may be one of the essential factors in achieving model calibration. We design numerical experiments to support this conjecture to reveal the behavior of focal loss and the relationship between calibration performance and curvature.
output: 在决策过程中实施机器学习算法的关键因素不仅仅在于模型的准确性，还包括其置信度。通常情况下，为了便于处理，分类问题中的模型置信度常由 Softmax 函数的输出向量给出。然而，这些值与模型实际预期的置信度存在显著偏差。这种现象称为模型校准，已有大量相关研究。其中一个最简单的解决方案是焦点损失法，该方法通过引入一个正参数对交叉熵进行了推广。尽管该理念及其形式化的简单性导致了众多相关研究，但对其行为的理论分析仍显不足。本研究旨在通过几何角度重新解释焦点损失函数来理解其行为。我们的分析提示，焦点损失能够降低训练模型时损失表面的曲率。这表明曲率可能是实现模型校准的关键因素之一。为验证这一假设，我们设计了数值实验，探讨了焦点损失的行为及其与校准性能和曲率之间的关联。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: But what gradually emerges, going along, is that the replicants aren't the monsters. As violent as the “skinjobs” are, you are meant to figure out that these are in fact runaway slaves. They're fleeing pursuit, trying to put a stop to their evil creators, and gain some hope of future out of all of this. The replicants have a love of life and freedom, but are doomed to imprisonment and premature death. They may have been manufactured, but they are incorporated with animal imagery, to give them a more natural, organic, soulful nature than the people they encounter.
output: 随着故事的逐渐展开，我们开始明白复制人并非怪物。尽管这些“皮肤工作”表现得十分暴力，你会逐渐发现，他们实际上是在逃亡的奴隶。他们逃避追捕，试图摧毁他们邪恶的创造者，希望从这一切苦难中找到一丝生机。复制人对生命与自由充满渴望，却注定要面对监禁和过早的死亡。虽然他们是被制造出来的，但是通过赋予他们动物的意象，使他们展现出比遭遇的人类更自然、更有机、更富有灵性的本质。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Cross-lingual continual pre-training of large language models (LLMs) initially trained on English corpus allows us to leverage the vast amount of English language resources and reduce the pre-training cost. In this study, we constructed Swallow, an LLM with enhanced Japanese capability, by extending the vocabulary of Llama 2 to include Japanese characters and conducting continual pre-training on a large Japanese web corpus. Experimental results confirmed that the performance on Japanese tasks drastically improved through continual pre-training, and the performance monotonically increased with the amount of training data up to 100B tokens. Consequently, Swallow achieved superior performance compared to other LLMs that were trained from scratch in English and Japanese. An analysis of the effects of continual pre-training revealed that it was particularly effective for Japanese question answering tasks. Furthermore, to elucidate effective methodologies for cross-lingual continual pre-training from English to Japanese, we investigated the impact of vocabulary expansion and the effectiveness of incorporating parallel corpora. The results showed that the efficiency gained through vocabulary expansion had no negative impact on performance, except for the summarization task, and that the combined use of parallel corpora enhanced translation ability.
output: 跨语言持续预训练大型语言模型（LLMs），最初基于英文语料库进行训练，使我们能够充分利用丰富的英语资源并降低预训练成本。在本研究中，我们通过扩充Llama 2的词汇库，加入日语字符，并在大型日文网络语料库上进行持续预训练，构建了一款增强型日语能力的大型语言模型Swallow。实验结果表明，通过持续预训练，日语任务的性能得到了显著提升，且性能随着训练数据量增至1000亿令牌而单调递增。因此，相较于从头开始用英语和日语训练的其他LLMs，Swallow展现出了优越的性能。对持续预训练效果的分析显示，它在日语问答任务中特别有效。此外，为了探究从英语到日语的跨语言持续预训练的有效策略，我们研究了词汇扩充的影响及并行语料库整合的效用。研究结果表明，词汇扩充提升了效率，且除了摘要任务外不影响性能，而并行语料库的使用则显著增强了翻译能力。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: A couple minutes before dinner, I went to wash my hands and came back and everyone was seated in their chairs at the dinner table with china, silverware and glasses. They had a place setting for me with a paper plate, plastic utensils and a stool at an awkward corner of the table. They had more chairs and more dishes and silverware, but chose to treat me worse than themselves. I was raised to always give guests the best of what I had, so I felt especially bad sitting there on a hard stool eating with my paper and plastic while everyone else had dishes and silverware.
output: 晚餐前几分钟，我洗手回来后，看到大家都已经坐在餐桌边。桌上摆放着精美的瓷器、银质餐具和玻璃杯。然而，他们给我准备的是一个纸盘、塑料餐具和一个角落里的不便凳子。尽管屋里还有足够的椅子和餐具，他们却选择对我待遇明显更差。我从小就学习要将最好的东西奉献给客人，因此，坐在硬凳子上，用纸和塑料餐具用餐让我感到格外心痛，尤其是看到其他人都在使用瓷质餐盘和银餐具时。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: This year, I’m starting to slowly phase out my bikinis, and finding an age-appropriate one-piece that doesn’t make me look like I’m stuffed in a sausage casing has been tough. I especially like this Rxrxcoco bathing suit because its ruching falls in the perfect places to better enhance my torso (and hide that unsightly flat tire that may be visible when I’m sitting down). I originally ordered a large because my bra size is a 34 DD, but it was huge on me, so I had to get the medium instead, which ended up being a perfect fit. All in all, for under $50 and with all the different color choices, I would recommend this bathing suit for all kinds of body types. — Tobey Grumet Segal, health, fitness and food editor
output: 今年，我开始逐渐淘汰我的比基尼，寻找一件适合我的年龄且不让我看起来像是被塞入香肠皮的连体泳装实在太难了。我特别喜欢这款Rxrxcoco泳衣，它的褶皱设计恰到好处，既能突出我的躯干线条，又能在我坐下时遮掩那不太雅观的“救生圈”。最初我订购了L号，因为我的胸围是34DD，但发现太大了，所以后来换成了M号，这才完美地合身。总的来说，这款泳衣不到50美元，且有多种颜色可选，我强烈推荐给各种身材的人。— Tobey Grumet Segal，健康、健身及食品编辑。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: A continuous rise in the penetration of renewable energy sources, along with the use of the single imbalance pricing, provides a new opportunity for balance responsible parties to reduce their cost through energy arbitrage in the imbalance settlement mechanism. Model-free reinforcement learning (RL) methods are an appropriate choice for solving the energy arbitrage problem due to their outstanding performance in solving complex stochastic sequential problems. However, RL is rarely deployed in real-world applications since its learned policy does not necessarily guarantee safety during the execution phase. In this paper, we propose a new RL-based control framework for batteries to obtain a safe energy arbitrage strategy in the imbalance settlement mechanism. In our proposed control framework, the agent initially aims to optimize the arbitrage revenue. Subsequently, in the post-processing step, we correct (constrain) the learned policy following a knowledge distillation process based on properties that follow human intuition. Our post-processing step is a generic method and is not restricted to the energy arbitrage domain. We use the Belgian imbalance price of 2023 to evaluate the performance of our proposed framework. Furthermore, we deploy our proposed control framework on a real battery to show its capability in the real world.
output: 可再生能源渗透率的持续上升，以及单一失衡定价机制的应用，为平衡负责方通过失衡结算机制进行能源套利以降低成本提供了新机遇。无模型的强化学习（RL）方法适用于解决能源套利问题，因为它们在处理复杂的随机序列问题方面具有卓越表现。然而，由于RL在执行阶段学习到的策略不能保证绝对安全，它很少被应用于实际场景。本文中，我们提出了一个基于RL的新电池控制框架，旨在失衡结算机制中实现安全的能源套利策略。在我们的控制框架中，系统一开始主要目标是优化套利收益。在后处理阶段，我们根据符合人类直觉的特性，通过知识蒸馏过程对学习到的策略进行了修正和约束。我们的后处理步骤是一种通用方法，并不局限于能源套利领域。我们利用2023年的比利时失衡定价数据来评估我们框架的性能。此外，我们还在一块真实电池上实施了这一控制框架，以展示其在现实世界中的应用效果。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: We apply multi-agent deep reinforcement learning (RL) to train end-to-end robot soccer policies with fully onboard computation and sensing via egocentric RGB vision. This setting reflects many challenges of real-world robotics, including active perception, agile full-body control, and long-horizon planning in a dynamic, partially-observable, multi-agent domain. We rely on large-scale, simulation-based data generation to obtain complex behaviors from egocentric vision which can be successfully transferred to physical robots using low-cost sensors. To achieve adequate visual realism, our simulation combines rigid-body physics with learned, realistic rendering via multiple Neural Radiance Fields (NeRFs). We combine teacher-based multi-agent RL and cross-experiment data reuse to enable the discovery of sophisticated soccer strategies. We analyze active-perception behaviors including object tracking and ball seeking that emerge when simply optimizing perception-agnostic soccer play. The agents display equivalent levels of performance and agility as policies with access to privileged, ground-truth state. To our knowledge, this paper constitutes a first demonstration of end-to-end training for multi-agent robot soccer, mapping raw pixel observations to joint-level actions, that can be deployed in the real world. Videos of the game-play and analyses can be seen on our website https://sites.google.com/view/vision-soccer .
output: 我们应用多智能体深度强化学习（RL）技术，对机器人足球策略进行端对端训练，完全依托于机载计算及通过自主RGB视觉感知。这种设置体现了现实世界机器人技术面临的众多挑战，包括主动感知、灵活的全身控制以及在动态、部分可见的多智能体环境中进行长期规划。我们依赖于大规模仿真数据生成，从自主视觉中提取复杂行为，并成功将其通过低成本传感器迁移到实体机器人上。为确保足够的视觉真实性，我们的仿真结合了刚体物理学和通过多个神经辐射场（NeRFs）实现的学习性真实渲染。我们融合了基于教师指导的多智能体RL和跨试验数据重用策略，以发掘复杂的足球战术。我们还分析了优化对足球策略感知不敏感的情况下，自发出现的主动感知行为，如追踪目标和寻找足球。这些智能体展示的性能和敏捷度与那些能够访问精确地面真实状态的策略相当。据我们所知，本论文首次展示了多智能体机器人足球的端到端训练，将原始像素观测转换为关节级动作，并能够在现实世界中部署。关于比赛过程和分析的视频，可在我们的网站 https://sites.google.com/view/vision-soccer 查看。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Like most of the filtering water bottles we tested, LifeStraw’s Go Series filters out harmful bacteria like E. coli and salmonella using a membrane microfilter, but the bottle also comes with a replaceable carbon filter for chlorine and odors. However, it only lasts for 100 liters. This is great if you’re traveling within the US or developed countries and want to filter out bacteria and bad taste, but we didn’t love that this meant an extra $5 maintenance cost every month or so. We prefer the lighter LifeStraw pouch for backcountry excursions since you can backwash it in the wild and the Grayl or CrazyCap for international travel, thanks to their virus-killing ability.
output: 与我们测试的其它多数过滤水瓶一样，LifeStraw的Go系列产品可以使用膜微过滤器去除大肠杆菌和沙门氏菌等有害细菌，此外，这款水瓶还配备了一个可更换的活性炭过滤器，专门用来去除氯和异味。然而，其使用寿命仅限于100升水。若您计划在美国或其他发达国家旅游，想要过滤掉细菌和不良的口味，这款水瓶非常适合；不过，每月大约增加5美元的维护费用让我们觉得不太理想。对于野外探险，我们更倾向于使用更轻巧的LifeStraw水袋，因为您可以在野外对其进行反冲洗。至于国际旅行，我们推荐使用Grayl或CrazyCap，它们具有杀灭病毒的能力。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: During his trial, the prosecution (F. E. Smith), who had admired some of Casement's work before he went over to the Germans, informally suggested to the defence barrister (A. M. Sullivan) that they should jointly produce what are now called the "Black Diaries" in evidence, as this would most likely cause the court to find Casement "guilty but insane" and save his life. Casement refused to agree to this and was subsequently found guilty and sentenced to be hanged. Before and during the trial and appeal, the British government secretly circulated some excerpts from Casement's journals, exposing Casement as a "sexual deviant". These included numerous explicit accounts of sexual activity. This aroused public opinion against him and influenced those notables who might otherwise have tried to intervene. Given societal norms and the illegality of homosexuality at the time, support for Casement's reprieve declined in some quarters. The journals became known in the 1950s as the "Black Diaries" and are still in the British National Archives, whilst most of the other exhibits from the trial are in the Crime Museum in London.
output: 在庭审期间，检察官费斯密（F. E. Smith）曾对凯斯门之前的一些工作表示赞赏，尽管凯斯门后来投靠了德国。费斯密非正式地向辩护律师沙利文（A. M. Sullivan）提出，他们应当共同将被称为“黑日记”的文件提交为证据，这将很可能使法院判凯斯门“有罪但精神错乱”，从而挽救他的生命。然而，凯斯门拒绝了这一提议，最终被判有罪并被判处绞刑。在审判和上诉过程中，英国政府秘密发布了凯斯门日记的部分摘录，将其描绘为“性变态者”，其中包括多起明确的性行为描述。这些信息激起了公众对他的反感，影响了那些原本可能会试图干预的显要人物。鉴于当时的社会规范和同性恋的非法状态，对凯斯门的缓刑支持在某些圈子中有所减弱。这些日记于1950年代被公之于众，称为“黑日记”，至今仍保存在英国国家档案馆中，而与审判相关的其他展品则存放在伦敦的犯罪博物馆。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: During the late 1970s, Peart augmented his acoustic setup with diverse percussion instruments, including orchestra bells, tubular bells, wind chimes, crotales, timbales, timpani, gong, temple blocks, bell tree, triangle, and melodic cowbells. From the mid-1980s, Peart replaced several of these pieces with MIDI trigger pads. This was done in order to trigger sounds sampled from various pieces of acoustic percussion that would otherwise consume far too much stage area. Some purely electronic non-instrumental sounds were also used. One classic MIDI pad used is the MalletKAT Express, which is a two-octave electronic MIDI device that resembles a xylophone or piano. The MalletKAT Express is composed of rubber pads for the "keys" so that any stick can be used. Beginning with 1984's "Grace Under Pressure", he used Simmons electronic drums in conjunction with Akai digital samplers. Peart performed several songs primarily using the electronic portion of his drum kit. (e.g. "Red Sector A", "Closer to the Heart" on "A Show of Hands" and "Mystic Rhythms" on "".)
output: 在1970年代末，皮尔特为他的原声鼓装置增加了多种打击乐器，包括管钟、管状铃、风铃、小钹、定音鼓、排鼓、锣、木鱼、铃树、三角铁和旋律牛铃。从1980年代中期开始，皮尔特开始使用MIDI触发垫替换一些乐器，以触发从各种打击乐器采集的声音样本，这么做可以避免这些乐器占据过多舞台空间。同时，他也引入了一些纯电子的非传统乐器声音。其中一个代表性的MIDI设备是MalletKAT Express，这是一个外形类似木琴或钢琴的两个八度电子MIDI装置，其由橡胶垫构成，可使用任意击打工具演奏。自1984年《Grace Under Pressure》以来，他开始将西蒙斯电子鼓与Akai数字采样器结合使用。皮尔特在多首歌曲中主要利用其鼓组电子部分进行演出，例如在“A Show of Hands”专辑中的《Red Sector A》、《Closer to the Heart》以及《Mystic Rhythms》等曲目。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Vision Transformers (ViTs) have recently garnered considerable attention, emerging as a promising alternative to convolutional neural networks (CNNs) in several vision-related applications. However, their large model sizes and high computational and memory demands hinder deployment, especially on resource-constrained devices. This underscores the necessity of algorithm-hardware co-design specific to ViTs, aiming to optimize their performance by tailoring both the algorithmic structure and the underlying hardware accelerator to each other's strengths. Model quantization, by converting high-precision numbers to lower-precision, reduces the computational demands and memory needs of ViTs, allowing the creation of hardware specifically optimized for these quantized algorithms, boosting efficiency. This article provides a comprehensive survey of ViTs quantization and its hardware acceleration. We first delve into the unique architectural attributes of ViTs and their runtime characteristics. Subsequently, we examine the fundamental principles of model quantization, followed by a comparative analysis of the state-of-the-art quantization techniques for ViTs. Additionally, we explore the hardware acceleration of quantized ViTs, highlighting the importance of hardware-friendly algorithm design. In conclusion, this article will discuss ongoing challenges and future research paths. We consistently maintain the related open-source materials at https://github.com/DD-DuDa/awesome-vit-quantization-acceleration.
output: 视觉变换器（ViTs）近期引起了广泛关注，作为卷积神经网络（CNNs）的一个有前途的替代方案，在多个视觉相关领域显示出强大的潜力。然而，其庞大的模型体积及对高计算能力和大内存的需求成为了其部署的障碍，尤其是在资源有限的设备上。这凸显了针对ViTs的算法与硬件的协同设计的必要性，旨在通过定制算法结构和底层硬件加速器以提升性能，发挥各自的优势。模型量化通过把高精度数值转化为低精度，有效减少了ViTs的计算需求和内存占用，使得可以针对这些量化算法设计专用优化硬件，以提高效率。本文详尽调研了ViTs的量化及其硬件加速情况。文章首先深入分析了ViTs的独特架构特征及其运行时表现，然后探讨了模型量化的基本原则，并进行了先进的ViTs量化技术的比较分析。此外，本文还论述了量化ViTs的硬件加速，强调硬件友好型算法设计的重要性。最后，我们将讨论当前面临的挑战和未来的研究方向。我们会在https://github.com/DD-DuDa/awesome-vit-quantization-acceleration上持续更新相关的开源资料。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: One year for Christmas I had asked for hair supplies for all 3 girls. Each daughter recieved headbands, hair ties, and barrettes for their hair type and individual fashion type. After breakfast and gifts I was picking up a little. I saw her “helping” which was not unusual, until I spotted her rummaging through the younger girls piles and “re organizing” them. The next day I tried to help the littles with their hair. They were excited for their new accessories! Well I could not find any of their things. Turns out my MIL had taken all the hair supplies from my other two daughters and gave it all, 100%, to her favorite granddaughter. She wasn't even the one who purchased it all, in fact several people did including my family and friends too.
output: 一年的圣诞节，我特意为三个女儑要了各式发饰。每个女儿根据自己的发型和个人风格，都收到了相应的发箍、发带和发夹。早餐和拆礼物过后，我开始稍微整理一下房间。我注意到她在“帮忙”，本没觉得有什么不寻常，直到看到她在翻弄两个小女孩的东西，并且“重新组续”它们。第二天，我准备帮小点的孩子们梳理头发，她们对新配饰兴奋不已。然而，我却怎么也找不到那些发饰。最终发现，我的婆婆将其他两个女儿的所有发饰全都拿走，百分之百地送给了她最喜爱的孙女。她自己其实并未出钱购买这些东西，购买者其实包括了我的家人和朋友们。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Joe Bloss, CNN Underscored’s editorial coordinator, notes that his mother “is not the most tech savvy” and still has yet to “properly move on from the era of wired earbuds.” Her current headphones, he tells me, are “a pair of Beats earbuds that loop over your ear [that she got] as a free extra with another purchase a while back, and she hates them. They don’t fit in or on her ear well.” Joe thinks it’s time for a change, and since his mother is retired and has more time for podcasts, audiobooks and music, “she needs a pair that won’t give her issues and will be a breeze to set up.” So, of course, he thinks Apple’s easy to use AirPods Pro “are a good bet.”
output: 乔·布洛斯是CNN Underscored的编辑协调员，他提到他的母亲“技术上不太在行”，而且一直未能“完全适应无线耳机时代”。他向我透露，她目前使用的是“以前购物时免费获得的一对贝兹品牌耳机，这种耳机挂在耳朵上，但她很讨厌它们。它们既不适合她的耳型，也不舒服。” 乔觉得该是换耳机的时候了，考虑到他的母亲已退休，有更多时间听播客、有声读物和音乐，“她需要一副易于操作且无需担心的耳机”。因此，他认为苹果的AirPods Pro“是一个理想的选择”。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: For partial filling at the top of the valence band, it is helpful to introduce the concept of an electron hole. Although the electrons in the valence band are always moving around, a completely full valence band is inert, not conducting any current. If an electron is taken out of the valence band, then the trajectory that the electron would normally have taken is now missing its charge. For the purposes of electric current, this combination of the full valence band, minus the electron, can be converted into a picture of a completely empty band containing a positively charged particle that moves in the same way as the electron. Combined with the "negative" effective mass of the electrons at the top of the valence band, we arrive at a picture of a positively charged particle that responds to electric and magnetic fields just as a normal positively charged particle would do in a vacuum, again with some positive effective mass. This particle is called a hole, and the collection of holes in the valence band can again be understood in simple classical terms (as with the electrons in the conduction band).
output: 在价带顶部部分填充时，引入电子空穴的概念非常有助于理解。虽然价带中的电子不断移动，但一个完全充满的价带却是惰性的，无法导电。如果从价带中移除一个电子，原本该电子所经过的轨迹现在将缺少电荷。就电流而言，满价带减去一个电子的状态，可以想象成一个含有正电荷粒子的完全空置带，在移动方式上与电子相同。结合价带顶部电子的“负”有效质量，我们可以构建一个正电荷粒子的模型，该粒子在电场和磁场中的响应与在真空中的正电荷粒子相同，同样具备一定的正有效质量。这种粒子被称为“空穴”，而价带中的这些空穴的集合，也可以用与导带中电子相似的简单经典理论来解释。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The executioner Bull and his assistant knelt before her and asked forgiveness, as it was typical for the executioner to request the pardon of the one being put to death. Mary replied, "I forgive you with all my heart, for now, I hope, you shall make an end of all my troubles." Her servants, Jane Kennedy and Elizabeth Curle, and the executioners helped Mary remove her outer garments, revealing a velvet petticoat and a pair of sleeves in crimson brown, the liturgical colour of martyrdom in the Catholic Church, with a black satin bodice and black trimmings. As she disrobed Mary smiled and said she "never had such grooms before ... nor ever put off her clothes before such a company". She was blindfolded by Kennedy with a white veil embroidered in gold, knelt down on the cushion in front of the block on which she positioned her head, and stretched out her arms. Her last words were, "In manus tuas, Domine, commendo spiritum meum" ("Into thy hands, O Lord, I commend my spirit").
output: 刽子手布尔及其助手跪在玛丽面前请求宽恕，这是行刑者向被处决者请求赦免的常规仪式。玛丽回答说：“我全心地原谅你们，因为我希望，你们现在可以终结我所有的痛苦。”她的仆人简·肯尼迪和伊丽莎白·科尔以及刽子手帮助玛丽摘下外衣，露出她所穿的天鹅绒短裙和深赤褐色的袖子，该颜色是天主教中象征殉道的礼仪颜色，配上黑色缎面的紧身胸衣和黑色装饰。玛丽脱衣时微笑着说她“以前从未有过这样的侍从……也从未在这么多人面前脱过衣服”。随后，肯尼迪用一块金线绣花的白色面纱为她蒙上双眼，她跪在刑台前的垫子上，将头部放置在木块上，伸展双臂。她的临终遗言是：“In manus tuas, Domine, commendo spiritum meum”（“主啊，我将我的灵魂托付于您的手中”）。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: 50 countries had purchased rights to the telecast, and when the numbers were added up, it was estimated that 300 million people worldwide had watched the fight, including 27.5 million people in the UK, about half the national population at the time. To put into perspective how big the fight was just in the UK, more people watched the fight than the closing ceremony of the 2012 Olympics games (which was in London) and the full coverage of the 2011 Royal wedding of Prince William and Kate (a British royal wedding), despite neither Frazier or Ali originating from the UK, and the fight taking place in America.
output: 50个国家购买了这场比赛的转播权。数据汇总表明，全球约有3亿人观看了这场比赛，其中英国就有2750万观众，约占当时全国人口的一半。进一步突显这场比赛在英国的重大影响力，观看该比赛的人数甚至超过了2012年在伦敦举行的奥运会闭幕式以及2011年威廉王子与凯特的皇家婚礼的全程直播观众人数，尽管乔·弗雷泽和穆罕默德·阿里都不是英国人，比赛也是在美国进行的。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The rotors (alternatively "wheels" or "drums", "Walzen" in German) form the heart of an Enigma machine. Each rotor is a disc approximately in diameter made from Ebonite or Bakelite with 26 brass, spring-loaded, electrical contact pins arranged in a circle on one face, with the other face housing 26 corresponding electrical contacts in the form of circular plates. The pins and contacts represent the alphabet — typically the 26 letters A–Z, as will be assumed for the rest of this description. When the rotors are mounted side by side on the spindle, the pins of one rotor rest against the plate contacts of the neighbouring rotor, forming an electrical connection. Inside the body of the rotor, 26 wires connect each pin on one side to a contact on the other in a complex pattern. Most of the rotors are identified by Roman numerals, and each issued copy of rotor I, for instance, is wired identically to all others. The same is true for the special thin beta and gamma rotors used in the M4 naval variant.
output: 转子（也可称为“轮子”或“鼓”，德语中为“Walzen”）构成了恩尼格玛密码机的核心部分。每个转子是一个由硬橡胶或电木制成、直径约为的圆盘，其中一面环布置有26个黄铜制、弹簧加载的电接触针，另一面则配有26个相对应的圆形板状电接触点。这些针和接触点代表字母表——通常为26个从A至Z的字母，本说明假定采用此字母表。当转子并排安装在轴上时，一个转子上的接触针将紧挨着邻近转子的板状接触点，从而形成电连接。在转子内部，26根电线以复杂的图案将一侧的接触针与另一侧的接触点连接起来。绝大多数转子以罗马数字进行标记，而且每一个发行的转子I与其他所有相同型号的转子接线方式完全一致。特制的用于M4海军型号的薄型贝塔和伽玛转子也遵循同样的规则。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Federated Learning (FL) is a decentralized learning paradigm, enabling parties to collaboratively train models while keeping their data confidential. Within autonomous driving, it brings the potential of reducing data storage costs, reducing bandwidth requirements, and to accelerate the learning. FL is, however, susceptible to poisoning attacks. In this paper, we introduce two novel poisoning attacks on FL tailored to regression tasks within autonomous driving: FLStealth and Off-Track Attack (OTA). FLStealth, an untargeted attack, aims at providing model updates that deteriorate the global model performance while appearing benign. OTA, on the other hand, is a targeted attack with the objective to change the global model's behavior when exposed to a certain trigger. We demonstrate the effectiveness of our attacks by conducting comprehensive experiments pertaining to the task of vehicle trajectory prediction. In particular, we show that, among five different untargeted attacks, FLStealth is the most successful at bypassing the considered defenses employed by the server. For OTA, we demonstrate the inability of common defense strategies to mitigate the attack, highlighting the critical need for new defensive mechanisms against targeted attacks within FL for autonomous driving.
output: 联邦学习（FL）是一种分布式学习模型，使得各方能在保障数据隐私的前提下共同训练模型。在自动驾驶领域，这种模式有助于降低数据存储成本、减少带宽需求并加快学习速度。然而，FL容易遭受投毒式攻击。本文中，我们提出了两种专为自动驾驶中回归任务设计的新型FL投毒攻击方式：FLStealth及偏轨攻击（OTA）。FLStealth是一种非针对性攻击，目的是提供表面上看似无害、实则能削弱全局模型性能的模型更新。与之相对的OTA，是一种针对性攻击，旨在触发特定条件时改变全局模型的行为。我们通过对车辆轨迹预测任务的全面实验，证实了这些攻击的有效性。具体来说，我们展示了在五种不同的非针对性攻击中，FLStealth最能有效规避服务器现有的防御措施。对于OTA，我们的实验显示，常规防御策略未能有效阻止攻击，这突显了在自动驾驶的联邦学习应用中，针对性攻击需要新型防御机制的紧迫性。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: 16. Human males have very highly evolved reflexes. This aids them in virtually any endeavor, from entertaining themselves with computerized devices, to dexterity in manual labor, to waging war. Out of all males, however, this is most highly developed in males that have fathered young. Frequently, the males’ mates will express alarm over what they view as risky behavior. However, the males’ extremely fast reflexes enable them to do things which, for most of the females, would be dangerous. Males also tend to have hyper spatial awareness. When it comes to the safety of their younglings, this awareness borders on precognitive capabilities.
output: 人类男性具有高度演化的反射能力，这在他们的各种活动中都起到了关键作用，无论是娱乐时使用电子设备、进行手工劳动时的灵活性，还是参与战斗。然而，在所有男性中，已经做父亲的男性在这方面的能力最为突出。男性伴侣常常对他们所认为的危险行为感到担忧。但男性极快的反射反应使他们能够安全完成许多对多数女性而言可能存在风险的活动。此外，男性通常具有高度发达的空间意识，在关注他们孩子的安全时，这种意识几乎可以媲美预知未来的能力。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: We introduce an intuitive method to test the robustness (stability and explainability) of any black-box LLM in real-time, based upon the local deviation from harmoniticity, denoted as $\gamma$. To the best of our knowledge this is the first completely model-agnostic and unsupervised method of measuring the robustness of any given response from an LLM, based upon the model itself conforming to a purely mathematical standard. We conduct human annotation experiments to show the positive correlation of $\gamma$ with false or misleading answers, and demonstrate that following the gradient of $\gamma$ in stochastic gradient ascent efficiently exposes adversarial prompts. Measuring $\gamma$ across thousands of queries in popular LLMs (GPT-4, ChatGPT, Claude-2.1, Mixtral-8x7B, Smaug-72B, Llama2-7B, and MPT-7B) allows us to estimate the liklihood of wrong or hallucinatory answers automatically and quantitatively rank the reliability of these models in various objective domains (Web QA, TruthfulQA, and Programming QA). Across all models and domains tested, human ratings confirm that $\gamma \to 0$ indicates trustworthiness, and the low-$\gamma$ leaders among these models are GPT-4, ChatGPT, and Smaug-72B.
output: 我们提出了一种直观方法，用于实时检测任何黑盒大型语言模型（LLM）的稳健性（稳定性与可解释性）。该方法基于称为 $\gamma$ 的局部偏离和谐性。据我们所知，这是首个完全独立于模型且无需监督的方法，能够基于模型符合纯粹数学标准来评估任意LLM响应的稳健性。我们进行了人工注释实验，测试结果显示 $\gamma$ 与错误或误导答案正相关，并且发现通过随机梯度上升法沿着 $\gamma$ 的梯度前进可以有效揭示对抗性提示。在GPT-4、ChatGPT、Claude-2.1、Mixtral-8x7B、Smaug-72B、Llama2-7B和MPT-7B等流行LLM上对 $\gamma$ 进行测量，覆盖数千次查询，使我们能自动并定量评估错误或虚假回答的可能性，并在多个客观领域（如Web QA、TruthfulQA和编程QA）中对这些模型的可靠性进行排名。在所有测试的模型和领域中，人类评价确认 $\gamma \to 0$ 指示高可信度，其中GPT-4、ChatGPT和Smaug-72B的 $\gamma$ 值较低，表现出较高的领导地位。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Reinforcement learning (RL) presents a promising framework to learn policies through environment interaction, but often requires an infeasible amount of interaction data to solve complex tasks from sparse rewards. One direction includes augmenting RL with offline data demonstrating desired tasks, but past work often require a lot of high-quality demonstration data that is difficult to obtain, especially for domains such as robotics. Our approach consists of a reverse curriculum followed by a forward curriculum. Unique to our approach compared to past work is the ability to efficiently leverage more than one demonstration via a per-demonstration reverse curriculum generated via state resets. The result of our reverse curriculum is an initial policy that performs well on a narrow initial state distribution and helps overcome difficult exploration problems. A forward curriculum is then used to accelerate the training of the initial policy to perform well on the full initial state distribution of the task and improve demonstration and sample efficiency. We show how the combination of a reverse curriculum and forward curriculum in our method, RFCL, enables significant improvements in demonstration and sample efficiency compared against various state-of-the-art learning-from-demonstration baselines, even solving previously unsolvable tasks that require high precision and control.
output: 增强学习（RL）提供了一个通过环境互动来学习策略的有前途框架，但常常需要大量的互动数据才能解决奖励稀疏的复杂任务。一种方法是通过引入展示期望任务的离线数据来增强RL，但以往的研究通常需要大量难以获得的高质量示范数据，尤其是在机器人技术等领域。我们的策略包括了先进行一个反向课程再进行一个正向课程。与过往研究不同，我们的方法能够通过状态重置为每个示范生成一个反向课程，从而高效利用多个示范。反向课程的结果是生成一个初步政策，该政策在狭窄的初始状态分布上表现出色，并助力解决探索过程中的难题。随后，我们利用正向课程来加速这一初步政策的训练，使其在任务的完整初始状态分布上有良好表现，并提升示范与样本的效率。通过我们的方法RFCL，我们展示了如何通过结合反向课程与正向课程，在示范和样本效率上相较于多种最先进的示范学习基线取得显著提升，甚至解决了之前无法完成的需精确度和控制力极高的任务。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The Irgun joined forces with Hatzohar and Betar in September 1937, when it assisted with the landing of a convoy of 54 Betar members at Tantura Beach (near Haifa.) The Irgun was responsible for discreetly bringing the Olim, or Jewish immigrants, to the beaches, and dispersing them among the various Jewish settlements. The Irgun also began participating in the organisation of the immigration enterprise and undertook the process of accompanying the ships. This began with the ship "Draga" which arrived at the coast of British Palestine in September 1938. In August of the same year, an agreement was made between Ari Jabotinsky (the son of Ze'ev Jabotinsky), the Betar representative and Hillel Kook, the Irgun representative, to coordinate the immigration (also known as Ha'apala). This agreement was also made in the "Paris Convention" in February 1939, at which Ze'ev Jabotinsky and David Raziel were present. Afterwards, the "Aliyah Center" was founded, made up of representatives of Hatzohar, Betar, and the Irgun, thereby making the Irgun a full participant in the process.
output: 艾尔冈在1937年9月与哈措哈尔和贝塔尔联手，协助一支由54名贝塔尔成员组成的队伍在位于海法附近的坦图拉海滩登陆。艾尔冈负责秘密引导犹太移民（即Olim）抵达海滩，并将他们安置在各个犹太定居点。艾尔冈也开始参与移民活动的组织工作，并且负责护送船只。此项工作始于1938年9月“德拉加”号船抵达英属巴勒斯坦的海岸。同年8月，阿里·雅博汀斯基（Ze'ev Jabotinsky的儿子）、贝塔尔的代表与艾尔冈代表希莱尔·库克达成了一个协议，旨在协调移民工作（亦称Ha'apala）。此项协议后来也在1939年2月的“巴黎会议”中得到确认，Ze'ev Jabotinsky和大卫·雷泽尔均出席了此会议。之后，创立了“阿利亚中心”，该中心由哈措哈尔、贝塔尔和艾尔冈的代表组成，标志着艾尔冈在此过程中的全面参与。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: A consistent spatial-temporal coordination across multiple agents is fundamental for collaborative perception, which seeks to improve perception abilities through information exchange among agents. To achieve this spatial-temporal alignment, traditional methods depend on external devices to provide localization and clock signals. However, hardware-generated signals could be vulnerable to noise and potentially malicious attack, jeopardizing the precision of spatial-temporal alignment. Rather than relying on external hardwares, this work proposes a novel approach: aligning by recognizing the inherent geometric patterns within the perceptual data of various agents. Following this spirit, we propose a robust collaborative perception system that operates independently of external localization and clock devices. The key module of our system, FreeAlign, constructs a salient object graph for each agent based on its detected boxes and uses a graph neural network to identify common subgraphs between agents, leading to accurate relative pose and time. We validate FreeAlign on both real-world and simulated datasets. The results show that, the  FreeAlign empowered robust collaborative perception system perform comparably to systems relying on precise localization and clock devices.
output: 在多个智能体之间实现一致的时空协调对合作感知至关重要，合作感知的目标是通过智能体之间的信息交换提高感知能力。传统上，这种时空对齐依赖外部设备来提供定位和时钟信号。然而，这些由硬件生成的信号可能会受到噪声干扰和潜在恶意攻击的影响，危及时空对齐的准确性。因此，本研究提出了一种新颖的方法，不依赖外部硬件，而是通过识别各智能体感知数据中的内在几何模式来实现对齐。基于这一理念，我们开发了一个独立于外部定位和时钟设备的鲁棒合作感知系统。该系统的核心模块，FreeAlign，为每个智能体构建了一个基于其检测框的显著对象图，并利用图神经网络识别不同智能体间的共同子图，从而准确地确定相对位置和时间。我们在现实世界和模拟数据集上对 FreeAlign 进行了验证。结果表明，采用 FreeAlign 的鲁棒合作感知系统的性能可与依赖精确定位和时钟设备的系统媲美。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Apple’s latest flagship notebook is currently $100 off on Amazon, marking a return to the first major discount we’ve seen — and the lowest-ever price we’ve found on this new release. You can score the starting configuration with 8GB of RAM and 256GB of storage for $999, with the higher-end 16GB/512GB model also marked down by $100 to $1,399. There’s just one catch: This deal only applies to the 13-inch model. Those hoping to save on the larger 15-inch MacBook Air may have to wait a bit longer. We expect this $999 model won’t stick around at that price, as it’s fluctuated on Amazon and gone back to its regular price at B&H Photo.
output: 苹果最新的旗舰笔记本目前在亚马逊上减价100美元，这是自发布以来所见的首次重要降价——也创下了该产品的最低价记录。您可以用999美元的价格购买基础配置，包括8GB的RAM和256GB的存储空间，而高端的16GB/512GB型号也同时降价100美元，仅售1399美元。不过，有一个限制：这个优惠仅适用于13英寸型号。那些希望购买更大尺寸15英寸MacBook Air的消费者可能还需耐心等待一段时间。我们预计这款999美元的笔记本价格不会持久，因为其在亚马逊的售价已有波动，并已恢复到B&H Photo的正常售价。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Transferring his capital to Pereyaslavets, Sviatoslav designated Vladimir ruler of Novgorod the Great in 970, but gave Kiev to his legitimate son Yaropolk. After Sviatoslav's death at the hands of the Pechenegs in 972, a fratricidal war erupted in 977 between Yaropolk and his younger brother Oleg, ruler of the Drevlians; Vladimir fled abroad and assembled a Varangian army to assist him in deposing Yaropolk. On his return the next year, he marched against Yaropolk. On his way to Kiev he sent ambassadors to Rogvolod (Norse: Ragnvald), prince of Polotsk, to sue for the hand of his daughter Rogneda (Norse: Ragnhild). The high-born princess refused to affiance herself to the son of a bondswoman (and was betrothed to Yaropolk), so Vladimir attacked Polotsk, took Ragnhild by force, and put her parents to the sword. Polotsk was a key fortress on the way to Kiev, and capturing Polotsk and Smolensk facilitated the taking of Kiev in 978, where he slew Yaropolk by treachery and was proclaimed knyaz of all Kievan Rus'.
output: 斯维亚托斯拉夫将首都迁至佩列亚斯拉维茨，并在970年任命弗拉基米尔为诺夫哥罗德的统治者，同时将基辅交给了他的嫡长子亚罗波尔克。斯维亚托斯拉夫于972年被佩切涅格人杀害后，977年亚罗波尔克与他的弟弟奥列格（德列缅人的统治者）间爆发了兄弟相残的战争；弗拉基米尔逃亡国外，召集了一支瓦良格军队以助其推翻亚罗波尔克。次年归来，他便向亚罗波尔克发起了进攻。在前往基辅的路上，他向罗格沃洛德（北欧名：拉格瓦尔德），波洛茨克的王子，派遣使节求婚其女罗涅达（北欧名：拉格尼尔）。这位出身高贵的公主拒绝与一个奴隶之子订婚（她已与亚罗波尔克订婚），因此弗拉基米尔攻占了波洛茨克，强行带走了拉格尼尔，并杀害了她的父母。波洛茨克是通向基辅的关键要塞，攻占波洛茨克和斯摩棱斯克为978年的基辅之战提供了便利，他在此诡计杀害亚罗波尔克，并被宣称为整个基辅罗斯的王子。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: These shorts are a good, quick option if you need a pair to throw on every once in a while. I love the pockets and they look decent, however, the material isn't stretchy and the cut is a little more restrictive than I'd like at the thighs. The inner mesh isn't as uncomfortable as some trunks I've worn, but I wouldn't want to sit in a kayak in these for more than a few hours. Overall, these are a good pair of shorts if you need a swimsuit in a pinch, just don't expect them to last season after season. — Kai Burkhardt, outdoor, sustainability and pets editor
output: 这些短裤是一个不错的临时选择，适合偶尔随意穿戴。我特别喜欢它们的口袋，外观也相当不错。然而，面料不够有弹性，而且大腿部位的剪裁比我预期的要紧一些。内部的网眼布料相较于我穿过的其他泳裤来说并不那么不舒服，但我还是不建议在皮艇中穿这条短裤坐太久，超过几个小时可能会感觉不适。总的来说，如果你急需一条泳裤，这些短裤是个不错的选择，但别指望它们能经久耐用，跨越多个季节。— 凯·伯克哈特，户外、可持续性和宠物编辑。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: “I can’t think of any other year where a studio as vital to this industry sits out the entire first half of the year,” Loria told CNN, adding that this is in large part due to production delays and schedule shifts caused by months of back and forth between studios, the Writers Guild of America and SAG-AFTRA, the actors’ union. “We tend to overemphasize the effect of Hollywood’s 2023 labor strikes at the box office, but it’s hard not to cite it when you look at the number of releases to have hit theaters from major studios in the first half of the year.”
output: “我真想不到还有哪一年的上半年，一个对整个行业至关重要的工作室会完全退出,” 洛里亚在接受CNN采访时说。他解释道，这主要是由于工作室之间、美国编剧工会与演员工会SAG-AFTRA的多月协商所引发的生产延误和日程调整。“我们常常过分强调2023年好莱坞劳工罢工对票房的影响，但当你观察今年上半年主流工作室的电影上映数量时，不提及罢工实在是难以避免。”

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The most heartwarming lunch I ever had outside of my home was when I was about 11–13 years old (I don’t remember the exact year) when i was over at my friend’s house on the day that was her father’s name’s day. When they started setting the table, I got up to leave and they insisted I stay and share the meal with them. After calling home & getting permission to stay, we set the table and my friend, one of her sisters, her father and I sat down and her mother brought the pan she had cooked lamb and rice in and plopped it in the middle of the table, brought in a bottle of wine and a salad and told us to dig in.
output: 我在外面体验过的最温馨的一顿午餐是在我11到13岁之间（我不太记得具体哪一年了），地点是一位朋友的家中。那天正好是她父亲的名字日。当他们开始布置餐桌时，我准备离开，但他们坚持让我留下共同用餐。在电话征得家里同意后，我们一起整理好餐桌，我、我的朋友、她的一个妹妹及她的父亲坐下就餐，她母亲随后拿来一个盛有炖羊肉和米饭的大锅，把它放在桌中央，还端来了一瓶酒和一碟沙拉，然后鼓励我们大家尽情享用。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The team is like a pot, Dravid often says. Some put in and some take out. The more who put in, the fuller it gets, and those were the players he enjoyed playing with the most: those who put into the pot. He was one of the leading contributors and there was never an effort at gaining sympathy or media attention for it. He gave quietly. He was one of the reasons why India recovered so quickly from the match-fixing issue around the turn of the century. Tendulkar’s genius is of an order that the average player cannot comprehend. Dravid’s greatness is not just comprehensible, it is reassuring.
output: 球队就像一口大锅，德拉维德经常这么说。有人往锅里添东西，有人从中取出。参与添东西的人越多，锅里的内容就越丰富，与这样的球员一起打球，他感到格外的愉悦：那些向锅中添料的人。他本人也是重要的贡献者之一，而且他从不为了获取同情或媒体的关注而努力。他总是默默地做出贡献。正是有了他，印度才能在世纪之交的操纵比赛丑闻后快速恢复过来。坦杜尔卡的才华是常人难以理解的，而德拉维德的伟大不仅让人理解，而且给人以深切的安心。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: We started chatting in whatsapp. She was working in our native coimbatore and I was working in Bangalore ( I'm still working in Bangalore). She told me that she didn't want to cheat me with a different identity, she told me that she is not educated. She stopped her education at the age of 13 to support her family. Yes she hails from a poor family. Her biggest fear was since I'm educated and was working in a reputed company , I may stop talking to her after knowing her true identity. But the fact is I started loving her after knowing the truth about her. I didn't wait , I proposed her that day. She didn't accept my proposal and she told me that she wanted to meet me and after that she would take a call whether to accept my proposal or not.
output: 我们是通过WhatsApp开始聊天的。她在我们故乡的哥印拜陀工作，而我则在班加罗尔工作（我目前仍然在班加罗尔）。她坦白说，她不愿意用伪造的身份欺骗我，并告诉我她未受过教育。为了帮助家庭，她在13岁时就停止了学业。没错，她出身于一个贫穷的家庭。她最大的担忧是，由于我受过良好的教育并在一家有声望的公司工作，可能在得知她的真正身份后不再与她交流。然而，实际上在了解了她的真实情况之后，我反而爱上了她。我没有犹豫，当天就向她表白了。她并没有立即接受我的求爱，而是表示想见面后再做决定是否接受我的求婚。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: However, whilst Mainwaring is a Grammar School boy, Wilson went to Public School. Grammar Schools are how the brighter members of the Middle Class - and to a much lesser extent the Working Class - got ahead, whilst the Public Schools were how the Upper Classes bought their offspring an advantage in life. Today we’d regard this as complete rubbish, but in 1940 it meant that everyone would see Wilson as not only being of a higher social class than Mainwaring, but also a more ‘natural’ leader. That’s why Wilson’s laconic replies to Mainwaring of “Are you sure that’s wise, sir?” carry such weight.
output: 然而，虽然梅恩瓦灵毕业于文法学校，威尔逊则出身于公学。文法学校是中产阶级中较聪明的一部分——以及在较小程度上的工人阶级——取得社会进步的途径，而公学则是上层阶级借以为他们的子女购买社会优势的方式。在当今看来，这种观念完全是荒谬的，但在1940年，这代表了人们普遍认为威尔逊不仅社会地位高于梅恩瓦灵，还更具有天生的领导魅力。这也是为什么威尔逊对梅恩瓦灵说“您确定这样做明智吗，长官？”时，这句话会显得格外有份量。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The New York Times review declared Swift “could use an editor,” effectively arguing the sprawling 31-track double album could have been curtailed. The New Yorker contended the album “suffers from being too long and too familiar,” adding that it suggests “after a decade, her partnership with [producer Jack Antonoff] has perhaps run its course.” Rolling Stone also knocked Swift’s work with Antonoff. The album “finds their collaborative well completely drained,” it said. “At a certain point, it begins to feel as though Swift and Antonoff are simply going through the motions while running in place.” On and on it went.
output: 《纽约时报》的评论指出泰勒·斯威夫特的专辑“需要一个编辑”，这是在有效地暗示这张包含31首歌曲的双碟专辑可以适当缩减。《纽约客》杂志则表明，这张专辑“因为过于冗长和雷同而受损”，并追加说这暗示“经过十年，她与制作人杰克·安东诺夫的合作似乎已走到尽头。”《滚石》杂志同样批评了斯威夫特与安东诺夫的合作，称这张专辑显示出“他们的合作潜力已完全耗尽”，“到了某个时候，看起来斯威夫特和安东诺夫只是机械地重复老套步伐，原地踏步。”这样的评论接连而来。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: During World War II, codebooks were only used each day to set up the rotors, their ring settings and the plugboard. For each message, the operator selected a random start position, let's say "WZA", and a random message key, perhaps "SXT". He moved the rotors to the "WZA" start position and encoded the message key "SXT". Assume the result was "UHL". He then set up the message key, "SXT", as the start position and encrypted the message. Next, he transmitted the start position, "WZA", the encoded message key, "UHL", and then the ciphertext. The receiver set up the start position according to the first trigram, "WZA", and decoded the second trigram, "UHL", to obtain the "SXT" message setting. Next, he used this "SXT" message setting as the start position to decrypt the message. This way, each ground setting was different and the new procedure avoided the security flaw of double encoded message settings.
output: 在第二次世界大战期间，密码本每天仅用于设定转轮、环设置以及插线板。每传递一条信息，操作员会随机选择一个起始位置，例如“WZA”，和一个消息密钥，比如“SXT”。他先将转轮调至“WZA”位置，并对“SXT”密钥进行编码。假设编码结果为“UHL”。随后，他以“SXT”作为新的起始位置加密整条消息。之后，他会发送起始位置“WZA”，编码后的消息密钥“UHL”以及密文。接收者根据首个三字符组“WZA”设定起始位置，并解码第二个三字符组“UHL”来获取“SXT”消息设置。然后他利用这一“SXT”消息设置作为起始位置解密信息。此法确保每次设置均不相同，新的操作程序有效避免了消息设置重复编码的安全风险。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: "We are going to see how Nadal reflects on what happened to him this year on clay, but at the end of the day he is human as well and it is normal to have seasons like that. I understand that people now question his game, but if you need a reminder of who he is you just need to take a look at his statistics. He is a great champion, has managed to come back already in his career so I don't think this is too much of a big deal for him. He is 29 and he is going to be able to bounce back and be very strong"-Novak Djokovic
output: 我们将看到纳达尔如何回顾自己今年在红土赛场上的表现，但最终，他也是个普通人，经历这样的赛季也是很正常的事情。我明白现在有人会对他的比赛提出质疑，但如果你想要再次认识他，只需看看他的数据统计就足够了。纳达尔是一位杰出的冠军，他在职业生涯中已多次成功逆袭，因此我认为这次挑战对他来说并不算太大。他现在29岁，完全有能力东山再起，展现出色的实力。 — 诺瓦克·德约科维奇

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Prior to deciding on LeMay, Wallace gave serious consideration to former U.S. senator, governor, and Baseball Commissioner A. B. Happy Chandler of Kentucky as his running mate. Chandler and Wallace met a number of times; however, Chandler said that he and Wallace were unable to come to an agreement regarding their positions on racial matters. Paradoxically, Chandler supported the segregationist Dixiecrats in the 1948 presidential elections. However, after being re-elected Governor of Kentucky in 1955, he used National Guard troops to enforce school integration. Other considerations included ABC newscaster Paul Harvey of Oklahoma, former Secretary of Agriculture Ezra Taft Benson of Utah, former Governor of Arkansas Orval Faubus, and even Kentucky Fried Chicken founder Colonel Sanders.
output: 在做出选择勒梅为竞选搭档之前，华莱士曾认真考虑过来自肯塔基州的前美国参议员、州长及棒球专员A.B. 哈皮·钱德勒。钱德勒和华莱士多次会面；然而，钱德勒表示在种族问题上他与华莱士的立场无法达成一致。值得注意的是，尽管钱德勒在1948年总统选举中支持主张种族隔离的南方民主党人，他1955年再度当选为肯塔基州长后却动用国民警卫队来强制推行学栗种族融合的政策。华莱士还曾考虑过其他人选，包括俄克拉荷马州的ABC新闻播音员保罗·哈维、犹他州的前农业部长埃兹拉·塔夫特·本森、阿肯色州的前州长奥瓦尔·福布斯，甚至是肯德基炸鸡的创始人桑德斯上校。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Between 2010 and 2014, 54% of all pregnancies in the Philippines (1.9 million pregnancies) were unintended. Consequently, 9% of women between 15 and 19 years of age have begun childbearing, and every year there are 610 000 unsafe abortions. In 2017, modern contraceptive prevalence rate (CPR) in "the Philippines was 40% among married women of reproductive age and 17% among unmarried sexually active women" and "Forty-six percent of married women used no contraceptive method in 2017 and 14% a traditional method." The "unmet need for family planning' which is the lack of access of contraceptives to women do not want to have more children or wish to delay having children was 17% among married women and 49% among unmarried and among unmarried only 22% women were able to access modern contraceptive methods. "As a consequence of the low contraceptive met need, 68% of unintended pregnancies occur in women not using any method and 24% in those using traditional methods" and the rest had to resort to unsafe traditional methods.
output: 在2010年至2014年期间，菲律宾有54%的怀孕（共计190万例）是非计划的。因此，在15至19岁的女性群体中，有9%的女性开始生育，每年还有610,000例不安全的堕胎。2017年，菲律宾已婚育龄女性的现代避孕使用率为40%，未婚且性活跃女性为17%。其中，46%的已婚女性在2017年没有使用任何避孕方法，14%使用了传统方法。家庭计划的“未满足需求”——指的是那些不想再生孩子或希望推迟生育的女性无法获得避孕措施——在已婚女性中为17%，在未婚女性中高达49%，而这些未婚女性中只有22%能使用现代避孕方法。由于避孕需求未能得到充分满足，导致68%的非计划怀孕发生在未使用任何避孕方法的女性中，24%发生在使用传统避孕方法的女性中，剩余的部分不得不采用不安全的传统方法。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The World Bank lists the main producing countries each year, based on the total production value. According to the 2019 list, Brazil has the 13th most valuable industry in the world (US$173.6 billion). In the Americas, it is second only to the United States (2nd place) and Mexico (12th place). In the food industry, in 2019, Brazil was the second largest exporter of processed foods in the world. In 2016, the country was the 2nd largest producer of pulp in the world and the 8th producer of paper. In the footwear industry, in 2019, Brazil ranked 4th among world producers. In 2019, the country was the 8th producer of vehicles and the 9th producer of steel in the world. In 2018, the chemical industry of Brazil was the 8th in the world. In textile industry, Brazil, although it was among the 5 largest world producers in 2013, is very little integrated in world trade. In the aviation sector, Brazil has Embraer, the third largest aircraft manufacturer in the world, behind Boeing and Airbus.
output: 世界银行每年根据总生产值列出主要生产国家。根据2019年的排名，巴西的工业产值位居世界第13（1736亿美元）。在美洲，它仅次于美国（第2位）和墨西哥（第12位）。在食品工业领域，2019年巴西是世界第二大加工食品出口国。2016年，该国是全球第二大纸浆生产国及第八大纸品生产国。在鞋类行业方面，2019年巴西位列全球第四。同年，巴西也是世界第八大车辆生产国和第九大钢铁生产国。2018年，巴西化工产业全球排名第八。在纺织业方面，尽管巴西2013年位列全球前五大生产国，但其在全球贸易中的整合程度却不高。在航空领域，巴西的Embraer是全球第三大飞机制造商，仅次于波音和空客。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Everyone thought Ali would come out dancing, using the ring to his advantage to box around Joe, but Ali knew Frazier was a traditionally slow starter who would use the early rounds to feel out his opponents rhythm and counterpunch them accordingly in the later rounds. He knew he had to catch Joe good and hard to put him down early on, or build up a wide points lead to help him in the long run. Ali fought flat footed against Frazier throwing hard jabs and combinations aplenty from the get-go. Ali built up a heavy points lead in the early rounds, with Frazier landing only a handful of solid punches, to which Ali shook his head is denial. But things soon started to change...
output: 大家都以为阿里会像跳舞一样在拳击场上轻盈移动，利用空间与速度围绕乔展开攻势。然而，阿里深知弗雷泽起步较慢，通常会利用前几轮来探测对手的节奏，以便在后续回合中进行有效的反击。因此，阿里清楚他必须在初期就对乔进行有力的打击，要么尽快将其击倒，要么大幅领先积分，为之后的比赛打下基础。阿里与弗雷泽的较量中，从一开始便采取稳重脚步，大力施展出重拳和连续组合拳。在初期的几轮里，阿里已经积累了大比分的领先优势，而弗雷泽仅有寥寥数拳得手，阿里对此则是摇头否认。然而，不久之后形势开始逐渐发生变化...

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The Powerbeats Pro are fully wireless earbuds that hook over the ear, anchoring them in place while you’re in motion. The hook is flexible and adjustable (I prefer them to be a little looser so they don’t rub at the back of my ear during long-time wear), and I found the rubberlike material to be a little sleeker and softer than those on other earbuds I tested. I tend to opt for over-the-ear headphones instead of earbuds during races and longer runs because the hooks give me the option of popping an earbud out of my ear canal so I can hear my surroundings or have a conversation with another runner if I want to. I’ve even taken an earbud out and hooked it onto my sports bra — and I haven’t lost one yet.
output: Powerbeats Pro 是全无线耳机，设有可固定在耳上的挂钩，让耳机在你运动时稳固不动。这个挂钩不仅灵活可调（我个人偏好略松的设置，这样长时间佩戴不会刮擦耳后），而且我发现这种橡胶质感的材料比我试过的其他耳机更加细腻柔软。在参加比赛或进行长跑时，我更倾向于使用挂耳式耳机而不是入耳式，因挂钩的设计让我能随时拿下耳机以聆听周围环境或与其他跑者交谈。我甚至尝试过把一个耳机挂在运动文胸上——至今未曾遗失过一个。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: With Jefferson out of office after 1793, Madison became the de facto leader of the Democratic–Republican Party. When Britain and France went to war in 1793, the U.S. needed to determine which side to support. While the differences between the Democratic–Republicans and the Federalists had previously centered on economic matters, foreign policy became an increasingly important issue, as Madison and Jefferson favored France and Hamilton favored Britain. War with Britain became imminent in 1794 after the British seized hundreds of American ships that were trading with French colonies. Madison believed that a trade war with Britain would probably succeed, and would allow Americans to assert their independence fully. The British West Indies, Madison maintained, could not live without American foodstuffs, but Americans could easily do without British manufacturers. Washington then secured friendly trade relations with Britain through the Jay Treaty of 1794. Madison and his Democratic–Republican allies were outraged by the treaty; the Democratic–Republican Robert R. Livingston wrote to Madison that the treaty "sacrifices every essential interest and prostrates the honor of our country". Madison's strong opposition to the treaty led to a permanent break with Washington, ending their friendship.
output: 杰斐逊1793年卸任后，麦迪逊成为名副其实的民主-共和党领导人。当英国和法国于同年爆发战争时，美国需要决定站在哪一边。之前，民主-共和党与联邦党的分歧主要集中于经济问题，但随着外交政策日益成为焦点，这种分歧加深了，尤其是在麦迪逊和杰斐逊倾向支持法国，而汉密尔顿则倾向英国的背景下。1794年，英国扣押了数百艘与法国殖民地贸易的美国船只，与英国的战争看似一触即发。麦迪逊相信，与英国的贸易战很可能取得成功，并将使美国人能够充分实现其独立。他坚称，英属西印度群岛离不开美国的粮食，而美国人却可以轻易地放弃英国制造的产品。然而，华盛顿通过1794年的杰伊条约，最终与英国确保了友好的贸易关系。麦迪逊及其民主-共和党同僚对此条约表示强烈不满；民主-共和党人罗伯特·R·利文斯顿在给麦迪逊的信中称该条约“牺牲了我们至关重要的利益，践踏了国家的荣誉”。麦迪逊对条约的坚决反对最终导致他与华盛顿的关系永久破裂，并结束了他们之间的友谊。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: We introduce an innovative, simple, effective segmentation-free approach for outcome prediction in head \& neck cancer (HNC) patients. By harnessing deep learning-based feature extraction techniques and multi-angle maximum intensity projections (MA-MIPs) applied to Fluorodeoxyglucose Positron Emission Tomography (FDG-PET) volumes, our proposed method eliminates the need for manual segmentations of regions-of-interest (ROIs) such as primary tumors and involved lymph nodes. Instead, a state-of-the-art object detection model is trained to perform automatic cropping of the head and neck region on the PET volumes. A pre-trained deep convolutional neural network backbone is then utilized to extract deep features from MA-MIPs obtained from 72 multi-angel axial rotations of the cropped PET volumes. These deep features extracted from multiple projection views of the PET volumes are then aggregated and fused, and employed to perform recurrence-free survival analysis on a cohort of 489 HNC patients. The proposed approach outperforms the best performing method on the target dataset for the task of recurrence-free survival analysis. By circumventing the manual delineation of the malignancies on the FDG PET-CT images, our approach eliminates the dependency on subjective interpretations and highly enhances the reproducibility of the proposed survival analysis method.
output: 我们提出了一种创新、简洁且无需分割的头颈癌（HNC）患者预后预测方法。该方法采用基于深度学习的特征提取技术和多角度最大强度投影（MA-MIPs），应用于氟代脱氧葡萄糖正电子发射断层扫描（FDG-PET）影像，从而避免了对原发肿瘤和相关淋巴结等感兴趣区域（ROI）的手动勾画。相反，我们训练了一种先进的目标检测模型，用于自动裁剪PET影像中的头颈区域。接着，使用预训练的深度卷积神经网络提取自72个多角度轴向旋转后的MA-MIPs中的深层特征。这些从多个投影视图中提取的深层特征经过聚合与融合后，用于对489名头颈癌患者进行无复发生存分析。该方法在目标数据集进行无复发生存分析的性能，优于目前最佳方法。通过规避FDG PET-CT图像上恶性肿瘤的手动描绘，我们的方法消除了对主观解释的依赖，显著提高了所提出的生存分析方法的可重复性。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I like to think I keep my car relatively clutter-free, but that can change quickly. If I’m heading anywhere with my fiancée, we’ll get into the car with a minimum of four iPhones, two wallets, two sets of keys and two water bottles. Maybe we’ll have a snack or coffee in tow. She probably has a bag full of more stuff, I probably have some sunglasses. You get the point: There are only so many compartments to store these items, and they inevitably end up in our laps before ultimately tumbling underneath a seat and into the abyss — until we discovered the Drop Stop car seat gap filler.
output: 我喜欢认为自己的车总是保持相对整洁，但实际情况很快会有变。每当我和未婚妻出行时，车上最少会有四部iPhone、两个钱包、两套钥匙和两个水瓶。有时我们还会带点小吃或咖啡。她往往会带一个装满杂物的包，而我通常会带上太阳镜。问题就在这里：车内储物空间有限，这些杂物最终总是不可避免地散落在我们的腿上，然后滑落到座椅下的无底深渊——直到我们找到了Drop Stop汽车座椅缝隙填充器。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Recent advancements in language models have demonstrated remarkable improvements in various natural language processing (NLP) tasks such as web navigation. Supervised learning (SL) approaches have achieved impressive performance while utilizing significantly less training data compared to previous methods. However, these SL-based models fall short when compared to reinforcement learning (RL) approaches, which have shown superior results. In this paper, we propose a novel approach that combines SL and RL techniques over the MiniWoB benchmark to leverage the strengths of both methods. We also address a critical limitation in previous models' understanding of HTML content, revealing a tendency to memorize target elements rather than comprehend the underlying structure. To rectify this, we propose methods to enhance true understanding and present a new baseline of results. Our experiments demonstrate that our approach outperforms previous SL methods on certain tasks using less data and narrows the performance gap with RL models, achieving 43.58% average accuracy in SL and 36.69% when combined with a multimodal RL approach. This study sets a new direction for future web navigation and offers insights into the limitations and potential of language modeling for computer tasks.
output: 近期在语言模型方面的进展显著提高了各种自然语言处理（NLP）任务的性能，例如网页导航。监督学习（SL）方法利用的训练数据远少于以往，已取得了显著的成就。然而，相较于展现出优异成效的强化学习（RL）方法，这些基于SL的模型显得不足。在本文中，我们提出一种创新的方法，将SL和RL技术结合应用于MiniWoB基准，借此发挥两者各自的优势。我们还针对以往模型在理解HTML内容时的一大局限性提出了改进措施：这些模型倾向于记忆目标元素，而非理解其背后的结构。为此，我们提出了多种增进真实理解的方法，并设立了新的基准结果。实验显示，我们的方法在使用更少数据执行特定任务时，性能优于先前的SL方法，并且显著缩小了与RL模型间的性能差距，SL平均准确率达到43.58%，与多模态RL结合的方法达到36.69%。这项研究为未来网页导航开辟了新的方向，并对计算任务中语言模型的潜力与局限提供了深入见解。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Throughout a conversation, the way participants interact with each other is in constant flux: their tones may change, they may resort to different strategies to convey their points, or they might alter their interaction patterns. An understanding of these dynamics can complement that of the actual facts and opinions discussed, offering a more holistic view of the trajectory of the conversation: how it arrived at its current state and where it is likely heading.   In this work, we introduce the task of summarizing the dynamics of conversations, by constructing a dataset of human-written summaries, and exploring several automated baselines. We evaluate whether such summaries can capture the trajectory of conversations via an established downstream task: forecasting whether an ongoing conversation will eventually derail into toxic behavior. We show that they help both humans and automated systems with this forecasting task. Humans make predictions three times faster, and with greater confidence, when reading the summaries than when reading the transcripts. Furthermore, automated forecasting systems are more accurate when constructing, and then predicting based on, summaries of conversation dynamics, compared to directly predicting on the transcripts.
output:
在对话过程中，参与者之间的互动方式总是在不断变化：他们的语调可能会变化，可能采取不同的策略来表达观点，或可能改变互动模式。理解这些动态变化有助于补充对实际事实和观点的讨论，从而提供对话发展轨迹的更全面视角：讨论是如何发展到当前的状态，以及未来可能的走向。

在本研究中，我们提出了总结对话动态的任务，通过构建一个人类编写的摘要数据集，并探索多种自动化基准方法。我们评估这些摘要是否能通过一个设定的下游任务来捕捉对话的轨迹：预测正在进行的对话是否最终会演变为有害行为。结果显示，这些摘要不仅帮助人类和自动化系统更好地进行预测，而且人类在阅读这些摘要时做出预测的速度是阅读原始对话记录的三倍且更加自信。此外，相比直接基于原始对话记录进行预测，采用对话动态摘要进行构建和预测的自动预测系统的准确度更高。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: For Roberts, the question is whether there’s any way to actually do that in this case — whether there is some way to make it possible for Trump’s trial to proceed before the election (so that the court isn’t accused of effectively taking the former president’s side) in an opinion that sets out a clear, forward-looking standard to govern this and future cases. We may not know the answer to that question for another two months. But the one thing that seems most clear coming out of Thursday’s argument is that the answer — and the broader legacy of the Roberts court — will ultimately be up to him.
output: 对罗伯茨来说，关键问题是在这种情况下是否有可能找到一个实际可行的方法 — 是否存在某种方式，能够确保特朗普的审判在选举前进行，从而避免法院被指控实际上偏袒前总统，并且在裁决意见中能够设定一个明确的、具有前瞻性的标准来指导这一案件及未来的案件。我们可能还需要再等两个月才能得知这个问题的答案。但从周四的辩论来看，最为明显的一点是，这个答案——以及罗伯茨法院的更广泛影响——最终将由他来决定。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: We propose TRAMBA, a hybrid transformer and Mamba architecture for acoustic and bone conduction speech enhancement, suitable for mobile and wearable platforms. Bone conduction speech enhancement has been impractical to adopt in mobile and wearable platforms for several reasons: (i) data collection is labor-intensive, resulting in scarcity; (ii) there exists a performance gap between state of-art models with memory footprints of hundreds of MBs and methods better suited for resource-constrained systems. To adapt TRAMBA to vibration-based sensing modalities, we pre-train TRAMBA with audio speech datasets that are widely available. Then, users fine-tune with a small amount of bone conduction data. TRAMBA outperforms state-of-art GANs by up to 7.3% in PESQ and 1.8% in STOI, with an order of magnitude smaller memory footprint and an inference speed up of up to 465 times. We integrate TRAMBA into real systems and show that TRAMBA (i) improves battery life of wearables by up to 160% by requiring less data sampling and transmission; (ii) generates higher quality voice in noisy environments than over-the-air speech; (iii) requires a memory footprint of less than 20.0 MB.
output: 我们提出了TRAMBA，这是一种融合了变压器和曼巴架构的混合体，专为移动和可穿戴设备上的声学及骨传导语音增强设计。骨传导语音增强技术在移动和可穿戴设备上的应用一直面临多重困难：（一）数据收集工作量大，导致数据稀缺；（二）现有的顶尖模型内存占用高达数百MB，与适合资源受限系统的方法之间存在明显的性能差异。为了让TRAMBA适应基于振动的感测模式，我们首先使用广泛获取的音频语音数据集对TRAMBA进行预训练。接着，用户仅需少量骨传导数据即可进行精调。TRAMBA在PESQ上的性能比最先进的GAN模型高出7.3%，在STOI上也提高了1.8%，其内存占用和推理速度分别是先前模型的十分之一和提高至465倍。我们已将TRAMBA整合至实际系统中，有效展示了TRAMBA能（一）通过减少数据采样和传输提高可穿戴设备电池寿命至多160%；（二）在嘈杂环境中生成的语音质量超过空中传输语音；（三）内存占用不超过20.0 MB。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Utilizing large language models to generate codes has shown promising meaning in software development revolution. Despite the intelligence shown by the general large language models, their specificity in code generation can still be improved due to the syntactic gap and mismatched vocabulary existing among natural language and different programming languages.
