In addition, programming languages are inherently logical and complex, making them hard to be correctly generated. Existing methods rely on multiple prompts to the large language model to explore better solutions, which is expensive. In this paper, we propose Syntax Graph Retrieval Augmented Code Generation (CodeGRAG) to enhance the performance of LLMs in single-round code generation tasks. CodeGRAG extracts and summarizes the control flow and data flow of code blocks to fill the gap between programming languages and natural language. The extracted external structural knowledge models the inherent flows of code blocks, which can facilitate LLMs for better understanding of code syntax and serve as a bridge among different programming languages. CodeGRAG significantly improves the code generation ability of LLMs and can even offer performance gain for cross-lingual code generation, e.g., C++ for Python.
output: 在软件开发领域，利用大型语言模型生成代码展示了巨大的潜力。尽管这些模型在普遍应用上表现出智能，但由于自然语言与不同编程语言之间存在的语法差异和词汇不匹配，它们在代码生成的精确性上还有提升空间。此外，编程语言本质上逻辑性强且复杂，使得正确生成代码难度加大。现行方法往往依赖于向大型语言模型多次提问以寻找更优解决方案，这一过程成本较高。在本文中，我们提出了一种语法图检索增强代码生成方法（CodeGRAG），旨在提高LLM在单次代码生成任务中的性能。CodeGRAG通过提取并总结代码区块的控制流和数据流，架构了编程语言与自然语言之间的桥梁。所提取的外部结构性知识有助于建模代码区块的内在流程，从而使LLM能够更深入地理解代码语法，为不同编程语言之间提供连接。CodeGRAG显著提升了LLM在代码生成方面的能力，并且能为跨语言代码生成带来性能增益，例如，使用C++为Python编写代码。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Shifting the focus from principles to practical implementation, responsible artificial intelligence (AI) has garnered considerable attention across academia, industry, and society at large. Despite being in its nascent stages, this emerging field grapples with nebulous concepts and intricate knowledge frameworks. By analyzing three prevailing concepts - explainable AI, trustworthy AI, and ethical AI, this study defined responsible AI and identified its core principles. Methodologically, this study successfully demonstrated the implementation of leveraging AI's capabilities into bibliometrics for enhanced knowledge discovery and the cross-validation of experimentally examined models with domain insights. Empirically, this study investigated 17,799 research articles contributed by the AI community since 2015. This involves recognizing key technological players and their relationships, unveiling the topical landscape and hierarchy of responsible AI, charting its evolution, and elucidating the interplay between the responsibility principles and primary AI techniques. An analysis of a core cohort comprising 380 articles from multiple disciplines captures the most recent advancements in responsible AI. As one of the pioneering bibliometric studies dedicated to exploring responsible AI, this study will provide comprehensive macro-level insights, enhancing the understanding of responsible AI while furnishing valuable knowledge support for AI regulation and governance initiatives.
output: 从原则到实践的转变，负责任的人工智能（AI）在学术界、工业界以及整个社会得到了广泛的关注。尽管这一新兴领域仍处于起步阶段，但它涉及众多不明确的概念和复杂的知识体系。通过分析三个主流概念——解释性AI、可信AI和伦理AI，本研究界定了负责任AI的含义并明确了其核心原则。在方法论上，本文展示了如何利用AI的功能进行文献计量学以加强知识发现，以及将实验模型与领域洞察进行交叉验证的实施效果。在实证研究方面，本文考察了自2015年以来AI领域贡献的17,799篇研究论文。研究内容包括识别关键技术参与者及其关系，揭示负责任AI的热点话题和层次结构，追踪其发展趋势，以及阐述责任原则与AI技术的互动。通过分析380篇涵盖多学科的核心论文，掌握了负责任AI的最新进展。作为首批致力于探究负责任AI的文献计量学研究之一，本研究将提供全面的宏观视角，增强对负责任AI的认识，并为AI的规范和治理提供有力的知识支持。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: By far, one of the most impressive things about Grayl’s GeoPress is the fact that the manufacturer says it can filter out viruses, which are much smaller than other pathogens, without the use of a UV-light disinfection system. This means that a user could stumble upon murky, stagnant water on a different continent and it would be able to safely remove both sediment and harmful critters from the source — a rare feat that would otherwise require UV or a specialized filter (and pre-filter). Plus, like many of the units we tested, the Grayl still filters out bacteria, parasites, heavy metals, pesticides and toxic chemicals.
output: 迄今为止，Grayl的GeoPress最引人注目的特点，是其制造商声称该设备能够过滤掉体积远小于其他病原体的病毒，且无需依赖紫外线消毒系统。这意味着用户即便在异国他乡偶遇浑浊且静止的水源，也能安全移除水中的沉积物和有害生物，这一罕见的功能通常需要依赖紫外线或特殊的过滤器（以及预过滤器）才能实现。此外，与我们测试的许多其他设备一样，Grayl的GeoPress还能过滤掉细菌、寄生虫、重金属、农药和有毒化学物质。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: “Added sugars are a significant source of excess calories, provide no nutritional value and may cause weight gain and increased risk for cardiovascular disease, diabetes and other chronic health conditions. We are thrilled to see the USDA has followed the recommendations from a 2022 citizen petition from the American Heart Association and other public health groups to include an added sugars standard in this final rule,” she said. “Although we are disappointed that the whole grain standard does not fully align with the Dietary Guidelines for Americans, and the sodium standard does not require more significant reductions, we understand recent legislation limited USDA’s ability to go further.”
output: “添加糖是多余热量的重要来源，并且不含任何营养价值，可能引起体重增加及增加心血管疾病、糖尿病和其他慢性健康问题的风险。我们非常高兴看到美国农业部根据2022年美国心脏协会和其他公共卫生组织的公民请愿建议，在这一最终规定中纳入了添加糖的标准，”她说。“虽然我们对全谷物标准未完全符合美国饮食指南感到失望，并且钠含量标准没有实现更显著的降低，我们理解最近的立法限制了美国农业部进一步采取措施的能力。”

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I have to say it’s been a really joyous experience. I think because I was only writing a small part of it. I contributed notes and I wrote one episode — but, generally speaking, there was a kind of acceptance that although I would be able to give notes, that my notes wouldn’t count any more than anyone else’s, and that it was fine to be defied. It was fine for people to say, “No, we’re going to do this a little bit different.” And they certainly did and that was great. It’s been a very happy collaboration.
output: 我必须说这真是一段非常快乐的经历。我认为这可能是因为我只负责了一小部分的写作。我提供了一些观点，并且负责写了一集——但通常情况下，大家都能理解，即使我提供建议，我的意见也并不比其他人的更加重要，人们对我的反对也能接受。对于他们来说，能够说出“不，我们想要稍做些改变。”是完全没问题的。他们的确做了改变，而这样的合作非常棒。这真是一次愉快的合作过程。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: With the rapid growth of technology, especially the widespread application of artificial intelligence (AI) technology, the risk management level of commercial banks is constantly reaching new heights. In the current wave of digitalization, AI has become a key driving force for the strategic transformation of financial institutions, especially the banking industry. For commercial banks, the stability and safety of asset quality are crucial, which directly relates to the long-term stable growth of the bank. Among them, credit risk management is particularly core because it involves the flow of a large amount of funds and the accuracy of credit decisions. Therefore, establishing a scientific and effective credit risk decision-making mechanism is of great strategic significance for commercial banks. In this context, the innovative application of AI technology has brought revolutionary changes to bank credit risk management. Through deep learning and big data analysis, AI can accurately evaluate the credit status of borrowers, timely identify potential risks, and provide banks with more accurate and comprehensive credit decision support. At the same time, AI can also achieve realtime monitoring and early warning, helping banks intervene before risks occur and reduce losses.
output: 随着科技，尤其是人工智能（AI）技术的飞速发展，商业银行的风险管理水平不断提升至新的高度。在当前数字化浪潮中，AI已成为金融机构特别是银行业战略转型的核心驱动力。对商业银行来说，资产质量的稳定性和安全性极为关键，这直接影响到银行的长期稳健发展。在众多风险管理领域中，信用风险管理尤为关键，因为它关系到大量资金的流动和信贷决策的准确性。因此，构建一个科学而有效的信用风险决策机制对商业银行具有重大战略意义。在这种背景下，AI技术的创新运用已经给银行信用风险管理带来了革命性的变革。通过深度学习和大数据分析，AI不仅能够精确评估借款人的信用状况，及时发现潜在风险，还能为银行提供更精确、更全面的信贷决策支持。同时，AI还能实现实时监控与预警，帮助银行在风险发生前采取干预措施，以减少损失。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I was initially super excited to try this suit because it has SO many positive reviews of women claiming it “fits like a glove” and is “the highest-quality swimsuit on Amazon” — but since swimsuits aren’t a one-size-fits-all, you never really know, especially when it comes to Amazon. However, I can confirm it’s worth the hype and more! It indeed fits true to size and the high-waisted bottoms really suck everything in and offer so much coverage. The top comes with padding, adjustable straps AND ties that you can maneuver to make the top a little extra cheeky, if that’s your vibe. — Stephanie Griffin, director of social
output: 我最开始对这件泳衣充满期待，因为它在亚马逊收获了众多好评，不少女士都说它“像手套一样合身”，甚至被誉为“亚马逊上质量最高的泳衣”——但泳衣毕竟不是一码通吃，尤其是在亚马逊购买，效果往往难以预测。然而，我可以肯定地说，它确实名副其实，甚至超出了预期！它的尺码非常准确，高腰裤底非常有效地塑形收腹，提供了极佳的遮盖性。上衣配有内衬垫、可调节肩带和可调节的系带，你可以灵活调整，打造出略带俏皮感的风格，如果这是你喜欢的话。 ——斯蒂芬妮·格里芬，社交媒体总监

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: By percentage of the vote, the states that secured Carter's victory were Wisconsin (1.68% margin) and Ohio (.27% margin). Had Ford won these states and all other states he carried, he would have won the presidency. The 27 states he won were, and still are, the most states ever carried by a losing candidate for president. Had Ford won the election, the provisions of the 22nd amendment would have disqualified him from running in 1980, as he served more than two years of Nixon's second term.
output: 按照得票率，确保卡特胜利的关键州包括威斯康星州（差距1.68%）和俄亥俄州（差距0.27%）。如果福特赢得这些州以及他所赢得的其他所有州，他就能够获得总统宝座。他所赢得的27个州是历史上败选的总统候选人中赢得州数最多的。如果福特当选，根据第22修正案的规定，由于他已完成尼克松第二任期中的超过两年，他将无法在1980年再次竞选总统。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: In the context of labour economics, inequality is usually referring to the unequal distribution of earning between households. Inequality is commonly measured by economists using the Gini coefficient. This coefficient does not have a concrete meaning but is more used as a way to compare inequality across regions. The higher the Gini coefficient is calculated to be the larger inequality exists in a region. Over time, inequality has, on average, been increasing. This is due to numerous factors including labour supply and demand shifts as well as institutional changes in the labour market. On the shifts in labour supply and demand, factors include demand for skilled workers going up more than the supply of skilled workers and relative to unskilled workers as well as technological changes that increase productivity; all of these things cause wages to go up for skilled labour while unskilled worker wages stay the same or decline. As for the institutional changes, a decrease in union power and a declining real minimum wage, which both reduce unskilled workers wages, and tax cuts for the wealthy all increase the inequality gap between groups of earners.
output: 在劳动经济学领域，不平等常指家庭间收入分配的不均。经济学家通常采用基尼系数来衡量不平等程度。基尼系数本身无具体绝对意义，主要用于比较不同地区的不平等情况。基尼系数越高，表明该地区的不平等程度越严重。总体来看，随时间推移，不平等现象有所增加。这种趋势由多种因素引起，包括劳动力供需变化及劳动市场的制度性变革。在劳动力供需方面，原因包括对熟练工人的需求增加超过其供给以及相较于非熟练工人的需求增长，同时生产力提升的技术变革也是一个因素；这些都导致熟练工人工资的上涨，而非熟练工人的工资则保持不变或下降。就制度变革而言，工会力量的减弱和实际最低工资的降低均压低了非熟练工人的工资，而对富裕人群的减税则进一步拉大了不同收入群体间的不平等差距。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: "To make the bread of his life, he started aghast his career as a Truck Driver along with his brothers in Nagpur. Just to avoid the shame of recognization, he set up his dummy name as 'Rana'. He used to stay with his family in a rented house in Nagpur. Earlier he used to drive truck on contract for someone. Then he got his own truck by getting a loan from the bank. But irony had decided something else for him and he met with an accident on October 28, 1990. He spent various days in the hospitals but his wounds on the leg were getting worse with every passing day. Ultimately his leg was amputed on November 28, 1990."
output: 为了谋生，他和兄弟们一起在那格浦尔开始了卡车司机的生涯。为了避免被认出的尴尬，他化名为“拉纳”。他与家人共同居住在那格浦尔租来的房子里。最初，他为别人签约驾驶卡车。后来，通过银行贷款，他购买了自己的卡车。然而，命运对他的安排却带来了讽刺，1990年10月28日，他遭遇了一起严重的事故。他在医院中度过了许多日子，但腿部的伤口随着时间推移愈发恶化。最终，到了1990年11月28日，他不得不接受截肢手术。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Offline Reinforcement Learning (RL) has shown promising results in learning a task-specific policy from a fixed dataset. However, successful offline RL often relies heavily on the coverage and quality of the given dataset. In scenarios where the dataset for a specific task is limited, a natural approach is to improve offline RL with datasets from other tasks, namely, to conduct Multi-Task Data Sharing (MTDS). Nevertheless, directly sharing datasets from other tasks exacerbates the distribution shift in offline RL. In this paper, we propose an uncertainty-based MTDS approach that shares the entire dataset without data selection. Given ensemble-based uncertainty quantification, we perform pessimistic value iteration on the shared offline dataset, which provides a unified framework for single- and multi-task offline RL. We further provide theoretical analysis, which shows that the optimality gap of our method is only related to the expected data coverage of the shared dataset, thus resolving the distribution shift issue in data sharing. Empirically, we release an MTDS benchmark and collect datasets from three challenging domains. The experimental results show our algorithm outperforms the previous state-of-the-art methods in challenging MTDS problems. See https://github.com/Baichenjia/UTDS for the datasets and code.
output: 离线强化学习（RL）在使用固定数据集学习特定任务策略上展现出了潜力。但成功的离线RL十分依赖于所给数据集的覆盖面及质量。面对特定任务的数据集受限时，一个直观的解决方案是引入其他任务的数据集来增强离线RL，即进行多任务数据共享（MTDS）。然而，直接从其他任务共享数据集会加剧离线RL中的分布偏移问题。在本文中，我们提出了一种无需筛选数据即可共享整个数据集的基于不确定性的MTDS方法。通过基于集成的不确定性量化，我们对共享的离线数据集进行悲观价值迭代，为单任务和多任务离线RL提供了一个统一的框架。我们还进行了理论分析，证明了我们方法的最优性差异仅与共享数据集的预期数据覆盖有关，从而有效解决了数据共享中的分布偏移问题。从实践角度来看，我们发布了一个MTDS基准，并从三个挑战性领域收集了数据集。实验结果显示，我们的算法在解决复杂的MTDS问题上超越了现有的先进方法。有关数据集和代码的详细信息，请访问 https://github.com/Baichenjia/UTDS。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Topological consistency plays a crucial role in the task of boundary segmentation for reticular images, such as cell membrane segmentation in neuron electron microscopic images, grain boundary segmentation in material microscopic images and road segmentation in aerial images. In these fields, topological changes in segmentation results have a serious impact on the downstream tasks, which can even exceed the misalignment of the boundary itself. To enhance the topology accuracy in segmentation results, we propose the Skea-Topo Aware loss, which is a novel loss function that takes into account the shape of each object and topological significance of the pixels. It consists of two components. First, the skeleton-aware weighted loss improves the segmentation accuracy by better modeling the object geometry with skeletons. Second, a boundary rectified term effectively identifies and emphasizes topological critical pixels in the prediction errors using both foreground and background skeletons in the ground truth and predictions. Experiments prove that our method improves topological consistency by up to 7 points in VI compared to 13 state-of-art methods, based on objective and subjective assessments across three different boundary segmentation datasets. The code is available at https://github.com/clovermini/Skea_topo.
output: 拓扑一致性在网格图像的边界分割任务中扮演着至关重要的角色，例如在神经元电子显微镜图像中的细胞膜分割、材料显微镜图像中的晶粒界分割，以及航拍图像中的道路分割。在这些领域，分割结果的拓扑变化对下游任务产生的影响极为严重，有时甚至超过边界位置错位的影响。为了提升分割结果的拓扑精度，我们提出了一种新型损失函数“Skea-Topo Aware Loss”，考虑了每个对象的形状和像素的拓扑重要性。该函数包含两个组成部分：首先，骨架感知加权损失通过更精确地利用骨架来模拟对象的几何形状，从而提高分割精度；其次，边界修正项在预测误差中有效识别并强调了拓扑关键像素，该项同时利用实际和预测中的前景及背景骨架。实验结果表明，相比13种现有的顶尖方法，我们的方法在三个不同的边界分割数据集上，基于客观及主观评估，拓扑一致性提升了高达7个VI点。代码已在 https://github.com/clovermini/Skea_topo 提供。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The rapid advancement in artificial intelligence (AI), particularly through deep neural networks, has catalyzed significant progress in fields such as vision and text processing. Nonetheless, the pursuit of AI systems that exhibit human-like reasoning and interpretability continues to pose a substantial challenge. The Neural-Symbolic paradigm, which integrates the deep learning prowess of neural networks with the reasoning capabilities of symbolic systems, presents a promising pathway toward developing more transparent and comprehensible AI systems. Within this paradigm, the Knowledge Graph (KG) emerges as a crucial element, offering a structured and dynamic method for representing knowledge through interconnected entities and relationships, predominantly utilizing the triple (subject, predicate, object). This paper explores recent advancements in neural-symbolic integration based on KG, elucidating how KG underpins this integration across three key categories: enhancing the reasoning and interpretability of neural networks through the incorporation of symbolic knowledge (Symbol for Neural), refining the completeness and accuracy of symbolic systems via neural network methodologies (Neural for Symbol), and facilitating their combined application in Hybrid Neural-Symbolic Integration. It highlights current trends and proposes directions for future research in the domain of Neural-Symbolic AI.
output: 人工智能（AI）的快速进步，尤其是通过深度神经网络的应用，已经在视觉和文本处理等领域催生了重大突破。尽管如此，开发出展现人类般推理和可解释性的AI系统仍是一个巨大的挑战。神经-符号范式，该范式将深度学习的神经网络能力与符号系统的逻辑推理能力相结合，为构建更加透明和易于理解的AI系统提供了一条看似有前途的道路。在这种范式中，知识图谱（KG）作为核心元素，提供了一种结构化且动态的知识表示方法，主要通过相互关联的实体和关系来表示知识，它主要采用三元组（主体，谓词，宾语）。本文探讨了基于知识图谱的神经-符号集成的最新进展，并阐明了知识图谱在以下三个关键领域如何支撑这种整合：一是通过融入符号知识提升神经网络的推理和解释能力（符号赋能神经）；二是通过应用神经网络的方法提高符号系统的完整性和准确性（神经优化符号）；三是促进这两者在混合神经-符号集成中的应用。文章还突出了当前的发展趋势，并为神经-符号AI领域的未来研究指出了方向。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The political skills that Díaz used so effectively before 1900 faded, as he and his closest advisers were less open to negotiations with younger leaders. His announcement in 1908 that he would retire in 1911 unleashed a widespread feeling that Díaz was on the way out and that new coalitions had to be built. He nevertheless ran for reelection and in a show of U.S. support, Díaz and William Taft planned a summit in El Paso, Texas, and Ciudad Juárez, Mexico, for October 16, 1909, a historic first meeting between a Mexican and a U.S. president and also the first time an American president would cross the border into Mexico. The meeting focused attention on the disputed Chamizal strip and resulted in assassination threats and other serious security concerns. At the meeting, Díaz told John Hays Hammond, "Since I am responsible for bringing several billion dollars in foreign investments into my country, I think I should continue in my position until a competent successor is found." Díaz was re-elected after a highly controversial election, but he was overthrown in 1911 and forced into exile in France after Army units rebelled.
output: 迪亚兹在1900年之前所展现的政治技巧逐渐消退，因为他及其核心顾问团对年轻领袖的谈判态度变得封闭。1908年，他宣布计划于1911年退休，这一消息激发了广泛的猜测，认为迪亚兹的时代即将结束，必须形成新的联盟。尽管如此，他仍决定参加再次选举，并且在得到美国的支持下，迪亚兹与威廉·塔夫特计划于1909年10月16日在德克萨斯州的埃尔帕索和墨西哥的华雷斯城举办一次峰会。这是首次墨美两国总统的会面，也是美国总统首次跨境访问墨西哥的历史性事件。会议主要关注有争议的查米萨尔地带，而此举也引发了暗杀威胁及其他严重的安全问题。在会议期间，迪亚兹对约翰·海斯·哈蒙德表示：“鉴于我负责为我国引进了数十亿美元的外国投资，我认为我应继续担任此职，直到我们找到一位能胜任的继任者。”在一场极具争议的选举后，迪亚兹再次被选为总统，但他于1911年被推翻，并在军队叛变后被迫流亡法国。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The paper introduces AniTalker, an innovative framework designed to generate lifelike talking faces from a single portrait. Unlike existing models that primarily focus on verbal cues such as lip synchronization and fail to capture the complex dynamics of facial expressions and nonverbal cues, AniTalker employs a universal motion representation. This innovative representation effectively captures a wide range of facial dynamics, including subtle expressions and head movements. AniTalker enhances motion depiction through two self-supervised learning strategies: the first involves reconstructing target video frames from source frames within the same identity to learn subtle motion representations, and the second develops an identity encoder using metric learning while actively minimizing mutual information between the identity and motion encoders. This approach ensures that the motion representation is dynamic and devoid of identity-specific details, significantly reducing the need for labeled data. Additionally, the integration of a diffusion model with a variance adapter allows for the generation of diverse and controllable facial animations. This method not only demonstrates AniTalker's capability to create detailed and realistic facial movements but also underscores its potential in crafting dynamic avatars for real-world applications. Synthetic results can be viewed at https://github.com/X-LANCE/AniTalker.
output: 本文介绍了AniTalker，这是一个创新型框架，设计用于从单张肖像生成栩栩如生的说话面孔。不同于那些主要关注唇部同步等语言线索，却未能捕捉到面部表情和非言语线索复杂动态的现有模型，AniTalker采用了一种通用运动表征。该表征有效捕捉了广泛的面部动态，包括细微的表情和头部运动。AniTalker通过两种自监督学习策略来增强运动描述：第一种策略是在相同身份的源帧与目标视频帧之间重建来学习细微的运动表征；第二种策略通过度量学习开发身份编码器，并积极地最小化身份与运动编码器之间的相互信息。这种方法确保了运动表征既是动态的，又不含身份特定详情，显著减少了对标注数据的依赖。此外，集成了一种扩散模型和方差适配器，使得生成的面部动画既多样化又可控。这种方法不仅证明了AniTalker在创造细致、逼真的面部动作方面的能力，也突显了其在为现实世界应用制作动态头像的潜力。合成结果可以在https://github.com/X-LANCE/AniTalker查看。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Union’s small but mighty staff put tremendous effort into working out all the logistics so we could make this happen, and our wonderful students worked hard to set up our courtyard on Monday evening for a meaningful Passover seder. The service – led by Columbia’s Jewish students – restored for those of us present our sense of community. It was wonderful to see Union’s diverse community of Christian, Jewish, Muslim, Buddhist and spiritual but not religious students congregate and share a meal with Columbia’s Jewish students. Together, they held a seder like those happening all over the world. There was prayer. There was quiet contemplation. There was laughter.
output: 联盟学院那支小而强大的团队付出巨大努力，解决了所有后勤问题，使得这次活动得以实现。我们优秀的学生们也在周一晚上辛勤地布置庭院，为举办这场意义非凡的逾越节晚餐做准备。该活动由哥伦比亚大学的犹太学生带领，让在场的我们重新找回了社区归属感。看到来自联盟学院多元化社区的基督徒、犹太人、穆斯林、佛教徒以及有灵性但不信教的学生们与哥伦比亚大学的犹太学生聚在一起共享晚餐，实在是太美好了。他们共同举办了一场与全球多处同时进行的逾越节晚餐相似的聚会。期间有祈祷，有静默思考，也充满了笑声。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Indira Gandhi International Airport, situated to the south-west of Delhi, is the main gateway for the city's domestic and international civilian air traffic. In 2015–16, the airport handled more than 48 million passengers, making it the busiest airport in India and South Asia. Terminal 3, which cost to construct between 2007 and 2010, handles an additional 37 million passengers annually. In 2010, IGIA was conferred the 4th best airport award in the world in the 15–25 million category, by Airports Council International. The airport was rated as the "Best airport in the world" in the 25–40 million passengers category in 2015, by Airports Council International. Delhi Airport was awarded "The Best Airport in Central Asia" and "Best Airport Staff in Central Asia" at the Skytrax World Airport Awards 2015. Hindon Domestic Airport in Ghaziabad was inaugurated by Prime Minister Narendra Modi as the second airport for the Delhi-NCR Region on 8 March 2019. A second international airport open for commercial flights has been suggested either by expansion of Meerut Airport or construction of a new airport in Greater Noida.
output: 印地拉·甘地国际机场坐落于德里西南部，是该市的主要民用国内及国际航空门户。在2015至2016年间，该机场接待了超过4800万旅客，成为了印度乃至南亚最繁忙的机场。2007年至2010年期间建成的3号航站楼，每年可处理额外的3700万名旅客。2010年，IGIA获得国际机场理事会颁发的世界第四佳机场称号，属于1500万至2500万旅客类别。2015年，该机场在2500万至4000万旅客类别中被评为“世界最佳机场”。同年，德里机场还在Skytrax世界机场大奖中荣获“中亚最佳机场”以及“中亚最佳机场服务人员”奖项。2019年3月8日，由总理纳伦德拉·莫迪主持的仪式上，位于加兹阿巴德的欣登国内机场作为德里-国家首都地区的第二机场正式启用。有提议通过扩建梅鲁特机场或在大诺伊达新建机场，以此开设第二家国际机场，开始运营商业航班。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I occasionally cut up all my food at the beginning. I don’t like using a fork and knife. I found cutting food with your right hand (knife) and eating the food with your left hand (fork) quite cumbersome. So, if I were served a gigantic piece of food, like a steak, I would cut it into small pieces, put down the knife, and use the fork (with my right hand) for the rest of the meal. For other types of food, like fish, salad, pasta, etc, I eat them with a fork and usually won’t even bother with a knife.
output: 我有时会在餐前先将所有食物切成小块。我不喜欢同时使用刀叉。我觉得用右手拿刀切食物，再用左手拿叉取食很不方便。因此，如果上来一大块食物，比如牛排，我会先将它切成小片，然后放下刀子，仅用右手持叉子吃完整顿饭。至于其他食物，像鱼、沙拉、意面等，我通常只用叉子吃，一般不会再用到刀子。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: ANN's Allen Divers wrote positive reviews of the anime, saying "The beauty of "Maison Ikkoku" is the fact that the entire cast feels dynamic enough that each could be the center of an episode without pulling away from the main idea of the series." and called it a must-see for fans of romantic comedies. Melissa Sternenberg of THEM Anime Reviews gave the show a perfect five star rating, calling the development between the two main characters refreshing and praising the supporting cast for reacting to what happens around them. Although she did point out the music and sound effects might seem dated. She finished saying "There may never be 'the greatest anime series of all time,' but I would bet a good amount of money that this series would be on most (respected) anime viewers' top five lists." TV Asahi released two Top 100 Anime lists in 2005; "Maison Ikkoku" came in 80 on the nationwide survey of multiple age-groups, and 89 on the web poll. A 2019 NHK poll of 210,061 people saw "Maison Ikkoku" named Takahashi's third best animated work.
output: ANN的艾伦·戴弗斯对这部动画评价颇高，他表示：“《相聚一刻》的魅力在于，其整个角色群均能动态地展现，每个角色都足以成为一集的核心，且不会背离剧集的主旨。”他还称它是浪漫喜剧迷不可错过的精品。THEM动画评论的梅丽莎·斯特恩伯格给该剧打出了满分五星，她认为两位主要角色间的互动清新可人，同时赞扬配角对周遭事务的反应。虽然她提到音乐和音效略显陈旧，她最终评价道：“也许永无‘史上最佳动画系列’，但我敢打赌，这部系列定会出现在多数（有影响力的）动画观众的前五名列表中。”2005年，电视朝日发布了两份动画百大榜单；《相聚一刻》在全国多年龄层的调查中名列第80，而在网上民调中排名第89。2019年，NHK对210,061人进行的调查显示，《相聚一刻》被评为高桥留美子第三佳的动画作品。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: State legislators in Tennessee passed a bill Tuesday allowing K-12 teachers and school staff to be armed. Educators who seek to bring a handgun on school grounds will be subject to certain conditions, according to a summary of the bill. They will be required to get an enhanced carry permit, complete a background check and undergo dozens of hours of training, among other requirements. The bill now heads to the desk of Republican Gov. Bill Lee for his signature. The contentious debate on arming teachers comes as gun violence remains the leading cause of death for kids in America. This year alone, 436 children under 18 have been killed in gun violence, according to the Gun Violence Archive.
output: 田纳西州的立法者于周二通过了一项法案，允许K-12年级的教师和学校工作人员携带武器。根据该法案摘要，希望在校园内携带手枪的教育工作人员必须满足特定条件：他们需要取得高级持枪许可证，完成背景调查，并经过数十小时的培训等。现在这项法案将送至共和党州长比尔·李的办公桌上等待签署。随着枪支暴力持续成为美国儿童主要死亡原因的背景下，关于是否应该武装教师的辩论持续激烈。据枪支暴力档案库的数据显示，今年已有436名不满18岁的儿童因枪支暴力丧生。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: So he kept churning out movies. One after another. He won Razzies, even, for how terrible critics deemed his recent work. People made fun of him. They mocked him. Thought he was just someone soullessly making movie after movie only for the money. They did not dig into the reasons behind it. And that’s tragic. Bruce Willis didn’t want to make the sort of cutting-edge, deep, well-acted movies that’d require him to endlessly repeat takes… no, he wanted to get done quick, and be home again with his loved ones. Minimal effort, maximum reward, until the moment his condition deteriorated to the point where he no longer could.
output: 所以他不断地推出新电影，一部又一部。他的近期作品被评论家认为极差，甚至还赢得了金酸莓奖。人们嘲笑他，讥讽他，认为他只是没有灵魂地机械制作电影，为的只是钱。他们没有去探寻背后的真正原因。这实在是悲剧。布鲁斯·威利斯并不想要制作那种需要他不断重复拍摄的、前沿的、深刻的、表演精湛的电影……他想要的是迅速完成拍摄，早日回到他所爱的人身边。尽可能少的付出，换取最大的回报，直到他的健康状况恶化到无法继续工作的地步。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: We then desperately looked for a place to eat but it was now getting late. Google Maps led us to one place and upon arriving it had changed hands and now only seemed to serve pizzas. There were no customers in the place. We had parked outside a Thai restaurant on the way here. We noticed it was jam-packed with customers. We went in. The decor was plain and simple, actually pretty ordinary. But the food was superb. It was a bring your own drinks and had a bottle shop next door. Turned out to be a great meal at less than half the price we would have spent. The locals knew it which is why it was crowded.
output: 我们急忙寻找可以吃饭的地方，但时间已经不早了。谷歌地图引导我们来到一个地点，到了那里才发现店家已经易手，现在只供应披萨，而且没有一个顾客。之前我们已经在一家泰国餐厅外停好了车。我们注意到那家餐厅里客人满满。于是我们决定进去尝试。餐厅的装潢简朴无华，可以说是相当普通。但是食物却非常美味。这里可以自带饮料，并且旁边正好有一家卖酒的店。最终，我们以不到一半的价格享用了一顿美好的晚餐。当地人都知道这个地方的好，这也是为什么那里那么拥挤的原因。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Large language models (LLMs) are applied to all sorts of creative tasks, and their outputs vary from beautiful, to peculiar, to pastiche, into plain plagiarism. The temperature parameter of an LLM regulates the amount of randomness, leading to more diverse outputs; therefore, it is often claimed to be the creativity parameter. Here, we investigate this claim using a narrative generation task with a predetermined fixed context, model and prompt. Specifically, we present an empirical analysis of the LLM output for different temperature values using four necessary conditions for creativity in narrative generation: novelty, typicality, cohesion, and coherence. We find that temperature is weakly correlated with novelty, and unsurprisingly, moderately correlated with incoherence, but there is no relationship with either cohesion or typicality. However, the influence of temperature on creativity is far more nuanced and weak than suggested by the "creativity parameter" claim; overall results suggest that the LLM generates slightly more novel outputs as temperatures get higher. Finally, we discuss ideas to allow more controlled LLM creativity, rather than relying on chance via changing the temperature parameter.
output: 大型语言模型（LLMs）应用于各种创意任务，产出包括美丽、奇特、拼贴，甚至直接抄袭等多样性成果。LLM 的温度参数调控输出的随机性，使输出更加多样化；因此，它通常被认为是控制创造力的参数。在本研究中，我们通过设定特定的固定环境、模型和提示，进行了叙事生成任务来探究这一理论。具体而言，我们针对不同温度设置下的LLM输出进行了实证分析，依据叙事创造中必需的四个条件：新颖性、典型性、凝聚力和连贯性。研究结果显示，温度与新颖性的相关性较弱，也符合预期地与不连贯性中度相关，但与凝聚力或典型性无显著相关性。然而，温度对创造力的影响远比“创造力参数”所声称的更为微妙和有限。总体结果表明，随着温度的升高，LLM产生的新颖性略有提升。最后，我们探讨了通过更为控制的方式激发LLM创造力的可能性，而不仅仅依赖于通过调整温度参数来增加随机性。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Decentralized learning (DL) offers a novel paradigm in machine learning by distributing training across clients without central aggregation, enhancing scalability and efficiency. However, DL's peer-to-peer model raises challenges in protecting against inference attacks and privacy leaks. By forgoing central bottlenecks, DL demands privacy-preserving aggregation methods to protect data from 'honest but curious' clients and adversaries, maintaining network-wide privacy. Privacy-preserving DL faces the additional hurdle of client dropout, clients not submitting updates due to connectivity problems or unavailability, further complicating aggregation.   This work proposes three secret sharing-based dropout resilience approaches for privacy-preserving DL. Our study evaluates the efficiency, performance, and accuracy of these protocols through experiments on datasets such as MNIST, Fashion-MNIST, SVHN, and CIFAR-10. We compare our protocols with traditional secret-sharing solutions across scenarios, including those with up to 1000 clients. Evaluations show that our protocols significantly outperform conventional methods, especially in scenarios with up to 30% of clients dropout and model sizes of up to $10^6$ parameters. Our approaches demonstrate markedly high efficiency with larger models, higher dropout rates, and extensive client networks, highlighting their effectiveness in enhancing decentralized learning systems' privacy and dropout robustness.
output: 去中心化学习（DL）通过在客户端之间分布训练、而无需中心集成，为机器学习带来了新的范式，显著增强了系统的可扩展性与效率。然而，DL的点对点模型在防御推断攻击和保护隐私方面面临挑战。在摒弃中心化瓶颈的同时，DL需要采用隐私保护的聚合方法，以防止“诚实但好奇”的客户和恶意攻击者泄露数据，确保整个网络的隐私安全。此外，隐私保护型DL在处理由于连接问题或系统不可用导致的客户端不提交更新的情况时，还需解决掉线问题，这进一步增加了聚合的难度。本文提出三种基于秘密共享的抗掉线技术，以增强去中心化学习系统中隐私保护的能力。我们在MNIST、Fashion-MNIST、SVHN和CIFAR-10等数据集上，对这些协议的效率、性能和准确性进行了实验评估。同时，我们将这些协议与传统秘密共享方案在包括多达1000个客户端的不同场景下进行了比较。评估结果表明，我们的协议在客户端高达30%的掉线率和模型参数多达$10^6$的情况下，明显优于传统方法。这些方法在处理大型模型、高掉线率和广泛客户网络时效率极高，充分证明了其在增强去中心化学习系统的隐私保护和抗掉线能力方面的有效性。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I have 5 beautiful cats. I recently bought a trailer house for $500 because I could find no one that would rent to me with 5 cats. The trailer house is pretty much a pitt from hell but I am working on it. My cats are worth it. I would have had to give 3 of them away to rent anywhere I saw. Now I own this little slice of “I'm gonna take every cent you have,” and I can keep all my babies. The best part of it is, I should be able to lose a lot of weight because now I can't afford to buy food. Haha.
output: 我养了五只可爱的猫。因为找不到愿意租房给我带这五只猫的房东，我最近花500美元买了一辆拖车房屋。这拖车房屋虽然破旧得像地狱一样，但我正在努力整修。这些猫咪对我来说值得这么做。如果我要租房的话，得放弃其中三只。现在我拥有了这么一小块“要榨干你每一分钱”的地方，我可以留住所有的小宝贝。最有趣的是，现在我因为买不起食物，应该可以减掉不少体重。哈哈。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Missing value imputation is a crucial preprocessing step for many machine learning problems. However, it is often considered as a separate subtask from downstream applications such as classification, regression, or clustering, and thus is not optimized together with them. We hypothesize that treating the imputation model and downstream task model together and optimizing over full pipelines will yield better results than treating them separately. Our work describes a novel AutoML technique for making downstream predictions with missing data that automatically handles preprocessing, model weighting, and selection during inference time, with minimal compute overhead. Specifically we develop M-DEW, a Dynamic missingness-aware Ensemble Weighting (DEW) approach, that constructs a set of two-stage imputation-prediction pipelines, trains each component separately, and dynamically calculates a set of pipeline weights for each sample during inference time. We thus extend previous work on dynamic ensemble weighting to handle missing data at the level of full imputation-prediction pipelines, improving performance and calibration on downstream machine learning tasks over standard model averaging techniques. M-DEW is shown to outperform the state-of-the-art in that it produces statistically significant reductions in model perplexity in 17 out of 18 experiments, while improving average precision in 13 out of 18 experiments.
output: 缺失值插补是许多机器学习问题中的关键预处理步骤。然而，它常常被看作是与分类、回归或聚类等下游应用分开的独立子任务，并未与之共同优化。我们提出假设，将插补模型与下游任务模型结合处理，并对整个流程进行优化，将获得比分别处理更优的结果。我们的研究介绍了一种创新的AutoML技术，用于处理带有缺失数据的下游预测，这种技术能够在推理阶段自动进行预处理、模型权重调整和选择，且计算开销极小。具体来说，我们开发了M-DEW，一种动态缺失感知的集成权重（Dynamic missingness-aware Ensemble Weighting, DEW）方法，它构建了一个包括两个阶段的插补-预测流程、独立训练每个组成部分，并在推理时动态为每个样本计算流程权重。因此，我们将以前关于动态集成权重的研究扩展到了完整的插补-预测流程中，以处理缺失数据，提升了在下游机器学习任务中的性能和校正精度，超越了传统的模型平均技术。M-DEW已被证明能够超越现有最先进技术，在18项实验中的17项中显著降低了模型的困惑度，并在13项中提高了平均精度。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Besides Mt. Everest and K2, the other 9 of the world's 17 tallest peaks on China's western borders are: Lhotse (8516 m, 4th highest), Makalu (8485 m, 5th), Cho Oyu (8188 m, 6th), Gyachung Kang (7952 m, 15th) of the Himalayas on the border with Nepal and Gasherbrum I (8080 m, 11th), Broad Peak (8051 m, 12th), Gasherbrum II (8035 m, 13th), Gasherbrum III (7946 m, 16th) and Gasherbrum IV (7932 m, 17th) of the Karakorum on the border with Pakistan. The tallest peak entirely within China is Shishapangma (8013 m, 14th) of the Tibetan Himalayas in Nyalam County of Tibet Autonomous Region. In all, 9 of the 14 mountain peaks in the world over 8,000 m are in or on the border of China. Another notable Himalayan peak in China is Namchabarwa (7782 m, 28th), near the great bend of the Yarlungtsanpo (upper Brahmaputra) River in eastern Tibet, and considered to be the eastern anchor of the Himalayas.
output: 除了珠穆朗玛峰和K2峰，中国西部边境上的其他九座世界最高的17座山峰包括：位于与尼泊尔交界的喜马拉雅山脉的洛子峰（8516米，世界第四）、玛卡鲁峰（8485米，世界第五）、卓奥友峰（8188米，世界第六）和加乔康峰（7952米，世界第十五）；位于与巴基斯坦交界的喀喇昆仑山脉的加舒尔布鲁木I峰（8080米，世界第十一）、布洛阿特峰（8051米，世界第十二）、加舒尔布鲁木II峰（8035米，世界第十三）、加舒尔布鲁木III峰（7946米，世界第十六）和加舒尔布鲁木IV峰（7932米，世界第十七）。完全位于中国境内的最高峰是位于西藏自治区聂拉木县的藏南喜马拉雅山区的希夏邦马峰（8013米，世界第十四）。总体上，世界上超过8000米的14座高峰中有9座位于中国或中国边境。在中国境内另一座引人注目的喜马拉雅山峰是南迦巴瓦峰（7782米，世界第二十八），它位于西藏东部雅鲁藏布江的大转弯处，被视为喜马拉雅山脉的东部界标。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: A conflict of interest is when a person or association has intersecting interests (financial, personal, etc.) which could potentially corrupt. The potential conflict is autonomous of actual improper actions, it can be found and intentionally defused before corruption, or the appearance of corruption, happens. "A conflict of interest is a set of circumstances that creates a risk that professional judgement or actions regarding a primary interest will be unduly influenced by a secondary interest." It exists if the circumstances are sensibly accepted to present a hazard that choices made may be unduly affected by auxiliary interests.
output: 利益冲突是指一个人或者组织同时拥有相交叉的利益（例如金融、个人等），这些利益可能导致潜在的腐败。潜在的利益冲突和实际的不当行为是分开的，它可以在腐败发生或者出现腐败迹象前被识别并有意避免。利益冲突是指一种情形：这些情形创建了一种风险，即专业判断或行为在处理主要利益时，可能会受到次要利益的不正当影响。只要这种情况合理地被认为可能引起风险，即决策可能会受到辅助利益的不正当影响，那么利益冲突就存在。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: This is one of those suits where if your body isn’t the same size on both top and bottom you could run into some issues. Though the bottoms fit perfectly on me, the medium-sized top didn’t fit my chest that well and left me spilling out more than I like. However, if you aren’t particularly busty I’m sure it’d be fine actually, given that the halter is completely adjustable and there are two straps in the back, one of which you tie yourself, which makes it feel extra secure. It’s actually a shame this one didn’t fit me, since the quality itself seemed great. — Rachel Lubitz, former senior lifestyle editor
output: 这是那种如果你的上下身尺寸不一致，可能会有些不便的泳衣。尽管下身的部分非常适合我，但中号的上身部分并未很好地适应我的胸部，露出了比我预期更多的部分。不过，如果你的胸部不是特别大，我相信应该完全没问题，因为颈部的绳带是完全可调的，背后还有两条带子，其中一条需要你自己系紧，这增加了穿着的安全感。实际上，这件泳衣的质量非常好，我很遗憾它不适合我。 — Rachel Lubitz，前资深生活方式编辑

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Schumacher has often been credited with popularising Formula One worldwide, especially in Germany, where it was formerly considered a fringe sport. In a 2006 FIA survey, he was voted the most popular driver of the season among Formula One fans. Throughout his career, Schumacher was subject to anti-German prejudices, especially from the British media. About his collision with Schumacher in 1994, British driver Damon Hill wrote: "There are two things that set Michael apart from the rest of the drivers in Formula One − his sheer talent and his attitude. I am full of admiration for the former, but the latter leaves me cold." In addition to Hill, Schumacher also had rivalries with Mika Häkkinen, whom he beat for his first World Championship at Ferrari and the team's first Drivers' Championship since the season, and Fernando Alonso, who ended Schumacher's five-consecutive titles in the 2000s. Despite only facing him during Schumacher's brief comeback in the 2010s, Lewis Hamilton is also seen a rival due to their similar achievements and driving styles, and cited him as inspiration.
output: 舒马赫常被誉为是将一级方程式赛车推广至全球的重要人物，尤其在德国，该运动在那里曾被视作小众运动。2006年国际汽车联盟的调查显示，他是那个赛季中最受赛车迷欢迎的车手。在其职业生涯中，舒马赫常遭受反德偏见，尤其是来自英国媒体。关于1994年与舒马赫的相撞事件，英国车手达蒙·希尔曾写道：“在一级方程式的车手中，迈克尔有两大优势——卓越的才华和独特的态度。对于前者我满含敬意，但后者却让我感到冷漠。”除了希尔，舒马赫还与米卡·哈基宁有过竞争，他在法拉利赢得个人首个世界冠军及车队自那赛季以来首个车手冠军，他还与费尔南多·阿隆索竞争，后者终结了舒马赫2000年代的五连冠。尽管舒马赫在2010年代短暂复出期间才遇到刘易斯·汉密尔顿，但由于他们的成就和驾驶风格相似，汉密尔顿也被视为他的竞争对手，并把他视为灵感之源。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: In 1952, although Margaret attended parties and debutante balls with friends such as Douglas and Mark Bonham Carter, the set were seen infrequently together. They regrouped in time for Coronation season social functions. In May 1953, Margaret met singer Eddie Fisher when he performed at the Red, White and Blue Ball. She asked him to her table and he was "invited to all sorts of parties". Margaret fell out with him in 1957, but years later, Fisher still claimed the night he was introduced to her was the greatest thrill of his lifetime. In June 1954, the Set performed the Edgar Wallace play "The Frog" at the Scala Theatre. It was organised by Margaret's by now best girlfriend Judy Montagu with Margaret as assistant director. It drew praise for raising £10,500 for charity, but criticism for incompetent performances. By the mid-1950s, although still seen at fashionable nightspots and theatre premieres, the set was depleted by its members getting married. As she reached her late twenties unmarried, the press increasingly turned from predicting whom she might marry to suspecting she would remain a spinster.
output: 1952年，尽管玛格丽特与道格拉斯和马克·博纳姆·卡特等朋友一同参加派对和首次正式舞会，这个圈子的成员并不常见于一起。到了加冕季的社交活动期间，他们重新聚集起来。1953年5月，在“红白蓝舞会”上，玛格丽特遇见了歌手埃迪·费舍尔，并邀请他加入她的桌子，此后他被“邀请参加了多种派对”。1957年，玛格丽特与他产生了争执，但多年后，费舍尔仍声称首次遇见她的那个夜晚是他一生中最激动人心的体验。1954年6月，这个圈子在斯卡拉剧院上演了埃德加·华莱士的剧作《青蛙》，由玛格丽特的至交好友朱蒂·蒙塔古组织，玛格丽特则担任副导演。虽然该剧因筹得10,500英镑善款而获赞，但其表演却遭到了批评。到了1950年代中期，尽管这个团体仍频繁出现在时尚夜店和剧院首映式上，但随着成员陆续结婚，人数逐渐减少。当玛格丽特步入二十岁后期仍未婚时，媒体从猜测她可能的婚姻对象转而怀疑她可能终生单身。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I’m from Texas and I’ve eaten steak all over the world. One of the most memorable steak dinners I’ve ever had was at Le Fonticine, Florence, Italy. We passed by the kitchen on the way to our table and I saw these massive steaks. There were three of us. All grown men. We ordered a 1 Kg T-Bone steak. When it was brought to the table, the owner of the restaurant carved it and served it to us. He had been serving us wine, salads, bread and olive oil and chatting us up. Made us feel super welcome. Everything, including the steak was exceptional.
output: 我来自德州，在全球各地都尝过牛排。其中最难忘的一顿牛排晚餐，是在意大利佛罗伦萨的Le Fonticine餐厅享用的。那天，我们在前往餐桌的途中路过厨房，看到了几块巨大的牛排。我们一共三个人，全都是成年男士。我们点了一公斤的T骨牛排。牛排送到桌上后，餐厅老板亲自为我们切开并端盘。在此之前，他已经为我们上了葡萄酒、沙拉、面包和橄榄油，并与我们愉快交谈。他的热情好客让我们倍感欢迎。不仅如此，包括牛排在内的每一样菜品都非常棒。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Before I dive into my go-to formulas, let’s discuss how Aquaphor actually works and why it’s beneficial for your face and skin. As board-certified dermatologist Dr. Adam Friedman explains, “Barrier products that are ointment-based create an ideal skin-healing environment by both occluding the skin and maintaining moisture where it’s needed.” In other words, ointments like Aquaphor act as a protective barrier that shields the skin from external irritants while sealing in moisture to help reduce transepidermal water loss (TEWL). It keeps the good stuff (hydration) in and the bad guys (bacteria and so on) out, thus creating an optimal environment for skin to repair itself.
output: 在我分享我的首选配方之前，让我们深入了解一下Aquaphor的工作原理以及它为何能有效护理您的面部和皮肤。正如获得董事会认证的皮肤科医生亚当·弗里德曼博士所解释的：“基于软膏的屏障产品可以通过封锁皮肤并保持必需的水分，从而营造出理想的皮肤愈合环境。” 换言之，像Aquaphor这样的软膏能够形成一层保护性障碍，不仅可以防止外界刺激物侵扰皮肤，还能锁住水分，帮助减少经表皮水分流失（TEWL）。它能保持肌肤所需的水分（保湿），阻挡有害物质（比如细菌等），从而为皮肤自我修复创造了一个最佳环境。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: When offering table food to a pet, everyone loves to see their eyes get big and the tail wag and the excitement and joy. The problem with table food is that a bite turns into a whole piece which turns into a small bowl which turns into their regular food. Table food is not a balanced diet and where it really makes a difference is when they are young and growing and need a balanced diet to achieve their optimum health and growth, and when they are older and start to develop kidney disease, liver disease, or other problems which REQUIRE restricted protein, fat, and other things. By then, all they will eat is table food and forcing a switch back to a beneficial diet like Hills Science Diet becomes impossible after years of eating from the table.
output: 在给宠物喂食桌面食物时，大家都喜欢看它们眼睛放大，尾巴摇摆，感受它们的兴奋与欢乐。但餐桌食物的问题在于，一小口很容易演变成一整块，然后成为一小碗，最终变成宠物的常规食物。餐桌食物并不是一种均衡饮食，其影响尤其明显在宠物正值成长阶段，需要均衡的饮食来保证最佳的健康和成长，或是当它们年纪渐大，开始出现肾脏病、肝脏病或其他需要限制蛋白质、脂肪等摄入量的疾病时。到最后，它们可能只愿意吃餐桌食物，使得将它们转换回到如希尔思科学饮食这样有益健康的食物变得极为困难，尤其是在它们多年来习惯了从餐桌获取食物之后。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: “The scientists at Novo Nordisk deserve great credit for developing these drugs that have the potential to be a game changer for millions of Americans struggling with type 2 diabetes and obesity. As important as these drugs are, they will not do any good for the millions of patients who cannot afford them,” Sanders, chair of the Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor and Pensions, wrote Wednesday in a letter to the drugmaker’s CEO. “Further, if the prices for these products are not substantially reduced, they also have the potential to bankrupt Medicare, Medicaid, and our entire health care system.”
output: “诺和诺德的科学家们因开发出这些潜力巨大的药物而值得极大的赞誉，这些药物有可能为数百万患有2型糖尿病及肥胖症的美国人带来转机。然而，对于那些负担不起这些药物的数百万患者而言，这些药物并无益处。”参议院卫生、教育、劳工及养老金委员会主席桑德斯在周三致该药企首席执行官的信中写道。“而且，如果这些产品的价格不能大幅度降低，它们还可能导致医疗保险、医疗补助乃至我们整个医疗体系的破产。”

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The placebo response, or the improvement in scores in the placebo group in clinical trials, is not only due to the placebo effect, but is also due to other phenomena such as spontaneous remission and regression to the mean. Depression tends to have an episodic course, with people eventually recovering even with no medical intervention, and people tend to seek treatment, as well as enroll in clinical trials, when they are feeling their worst. In meta-analyses of trials of depression therapies, Kirsch estimated based on improvement in untreated waiting-list controls that spontaneous remission and regression to the mean only account for about 25% of the improvement in depression scores with antidepressant therapy. However, another academic, Michael P. Hengartner, has argued and presented evidence that spontaneous remission and regression to the mean might actually account for most of the improvement in depression scores with antidepressants, and that the substantial placebo effect observed in clinical trials might largely be a methodological artifact. This suggests that antidepressants may be associated with much less genuine treatment benefit, whether due to the placebo effect or to the antidepressant itself, than has been traditionally assumed.
output: 安慰剂反应，即临床试验中安慰剂组评分的改善，并不仅由安慰剂效应所引起，还包括自发缓解和均值回归等其他现象。抑郁症通常呈周期性发作，即使无医疗干预，患者最终也能康复。人们通常在情况最糟糕时寻求治疗或报名参加临床试验。在对抗抑郁疗法试验的荟萃分析中，基尔希根据未治疗的等候名单对照组的改善状况估计，自发缓解和均值回归仅能解释抗抑郁治疗带来的约25%的抑郁评分改善。然而，另一位学者迈克尔·P·亨根纳特则提出了相反的观点，并提供了证据表明自发缓解和均值回归实际上可能占抗抑郁药改善抑郁评分的大部分，并且临床试验中观察到的显著的安慰剂效应很可能大多是一种方法学的伪影。这意味着抗抑郁药相比于传统认为的真实治疗效果，无论是由于安慰剂效应还是药物本身，可能远低于预期。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The emergence of multimodal data on social media platforms presents new opportunities to better understand user sentiments toward a given aspect. However, existing multimodal datasets for Aspect-Category Sentiment Analysis (ACSA) often focus on textual annotations, neglecting fine-grained information in images. Consequently, these datasets fail to fully exploit the richness inherent in multimodal. To address this, we introduce a new Vietnamese multimodal dataset, named ViMACSA, which consists of 4,876 text-image pairs with 14,618 fine-grained annotations for both text and image in the hotel domain. Additionally, we propose a Fine-Grained Cross-Modal Fusion Framework (FCMF) that effectively learns both intra- and inter-modality interactions and then fuses these information to produce a unified multimodal representation. Experimental results show that our framework outperforms SOTA models on the ViMACSA dataset, achieving the highest F1 score of 79.73%. We also explore characteristics and challenges in Vietnamese multimodal sentiment analysis, including misspellings, abbreviations, and the complexities of the Vietnamese language. This work contributes both a benchmark dataset and a new framework that leverages fine-grained multimodal information to improve multimodal aspect-category sentiment analysis. Our dataset is available for research purposes: https://github.com/hoangquy18/Multimodal-Aspect-Category-Sentiment-Analysis.
output: 社交媒体平台上多模态数据的涌现为更深入理解用户对特定方面情感的分析提供了新机遇。然而，现有的面向方面类别情感分析（ACSA）的多模态数据集主要集中在文本注释上，而忽视了图像中的细粒度信息。由此，这些数据集未能完全发挥多模态数据的丰富潜力。为了解决这一问题，我们推出了一个新的越南多模态数据集，命名为ViMACSA，包含4,876个文本-图像对，并附有14,618个细粒度注释，涵盖了酒店领域中文本和图像的分析。此外，我们提出了一种细粒度跨模态融合框架（FCMF），该框架有效地学习了模态内部和模态间的互动，进而将这些信息整合形成统一的多模态表征。实验结果显示，我们的框架在ViMACSA数据集上的表现超过了现有最先进模型，实现了最高79.73%的F1分数。我们还探讨了越南多模态情感分析的特点和挑战，包括拼写错误、缩写及越南语的复杂性。本项研究不仅提供了一个基准数据集，还开发了一个新的框架，通过利用细粒度多模态信息来增强多模态方面类别情感分析的效果。我们的数据集可供研究之用，详情访问：https://github.com/hoangquy18/Multimodal-Aspect-Category-Sentiment-Analysis.

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Deciphering the intricacies of the human brain has captivated curiosity for centuries. Recent strides in Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) technology, particularly using motor imagery, have restored motor functions such as reaching, grasping, and walking in paralyzed individuals. However, unraveling natural language from brain signals remains a formidable challenge. Electroencephalography (EEG) is a non-invasive technique used to record electrical activity in the brain by placing electrodes on the scalp. Previous studies of EEG-to-text decoding have achieved high accuracy on small closed vocabularies, but still fall short of high accuracy when dealing with large open vocabularies. We propose a novel method, EEG2TEXT, to improve the accuracy of open vocabulary EEG-to-text decoding. Specifically, EEG2TEXT leverages EEG pre-training to enhance the learning of semantics from EEG signals and proposes a multi-view transformer to model the EEG signal processing by different spatial regions of the brain. Experiments show that EEG2TEXT has superior performance, outperforming the state-of-the-art baseline methods by a large margin of up to 5% in absolute BLEU and ROUGE scores. EEG2TEXT shows great potential for a high-performance open-vocabulary brain-to-text system to facilitate communication.
output: 解读人类大脑的复杂性几个世纪以来一直激发着人类的好奇心。近期在脑-计算机接口（BCI）技术，尤其是运动想象技术的进展，已使瘫痪患者能够恢复抓取、伸手及行走等基本动作功能。然而，从大脑信号解读自然语言依旧是一项艰巨的挑战。脑电图（EEG）是一种通过在头皮上放置电极来记录大脑电活动的非侵入性技术。之前关于EEG转换为文本的研究在小型封闭词汇库中已实现高精度，但在处理大型开放词汇库时，其精确度仍有待提高。我们提出了一种创新方法EEG2TEXT，旨在提升开放词汇库EEG到文本解码的准确度。具体而言，EEG2TEXT通过EEG预训练增强了从EEG信号中学习语义的效果，并推出了一种多视角变换器，用以模拟大脑不同区域处理EEG信号的功能。实验结果表明，EEG2TEXT的性能优于现有最先进技术，其绝对BLEU和ROUGE评分较基准方法至少提高了5%。EEG2TEXT展现了构建高性能开放词汇脑-文本系统，以促进沟通交流的巨大潜力。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Object detection algorithms particularly those based on YOLO have demonstrated remarkable efficiency in balancing speed and accuracy. However, their application in brain tumour detection remains underexplored. This study proposes RepVGG-GELAN, a novel YOLO architecture enhanced with RepVGG, a reparameterized convolutional approach for object detection tasks particularly focusing on brain tumour detection within medical images. RepVGG-GELAN leverages the RepVGG architecture to improve both speed and accuracy in detecting brain tumours. Integrating RepVGG into the YOLO framework aims to achieve a balance between computational efficiency and detection performance. This study includes a spatial pyramid pooling-based Generalized Efficient Layer Aggregation Network (GELAN) architecture which further enhances the capability of RepVGG. Experimental evaluation conducted on a brain tumour dataset demonstrates the effectiveness of RepVGG-GELAN surpassing existing RCS-YOLO in terms of precision and speed. Specifically, RepVGG-GELAN achieves an increased precision of 4.91% and an increased AP50 of 2.54% over the latest existing approach while operating at 240.7 GFLOPs. The proposed RepVGG-GELAN with GELAN architecture presents promising results establishing itself as a state-of-the-art solution for accurate and efficient brain tumour detection in medical images. The implementation code is publicly available at https://github.com/ThensiB/RepVGG-GELAN.
output: 目标检测算法尤其是基于YOLO的方法，在平衡速度与精确度方面展示了卓越效率。然而，这些算法在脑肿瘤检测领域的应用尚未得到深入研究。本研究提出了一种名为RepVGG-GELAN的新型YOLO架构，该架构通过采用重新参数化的卷积技术RepVGG增强了针对医学图像中脑肿瘤检测的功能。RepVGG-GELAN利用RepVGG架构显著提升了检测脑肿瘤的速度和准确性。整合RepVGG至YOLO框架的目的是在计算效率与检测性能之间达到最佳平衡。该研究还引入了一个基于空间金字塔池化的通用高效层聚合网络（GELAN）架构，进一步增强了RepVGG的性能。通过对脑肿瘤数据集的实验评估表明，RepVGG-GELAN在精度和速度方面都超越了现有的RCS-YOLO算法。具体来说，RepVGG-GELAN的精确度提升了4.91%，AP50提升了2.54%，运行效能达到240.7 GFLOPs。提出的RepVGG-GELAN搭载GELAN架构，在医学影像中进行脑肿瘤检测表现出卓越的准确性和高效性，确立了其在该领域的领先地位。实现代码已在https://github.com/ThensiB/RepVGG-GELAN公开发布。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Recent work has shown the promise of applying deep learning to enhance software processing of radio frequency (RF) signals. In parallel, hardware developments with quantum RF sensors based on Rydberg atoms are breaking longstanding barriers in frequency range, resolution, and sensitivity. In this paper, we describe our implementations of quantum-ready machine learning approaches for RF signal classification. Our primary objective is latency: while deep learning offers a more powerful computational paradigm, it also traditionally incurs latency overheads that hinder wider scale deployment. Our work spans three axes. (1) A novel continuous wavelet transform (CWT) based recurrent neural network (RNN) architecture that enables flexible online classification of RF signals on-the-fly with reduced sampling time. (2) Low-latency inference techniques for both GPU and CPU that span over 100x reductions in inference time, enabling real-time operation with sub-millisecond inference. (3) Quantum-readiness validated through application of our models to physics-based simulation of Rydberg atom QRF sensors. Altogether, our work bridges towards next-generation RF sensors that use quantum technology to surpass previous physical limits, paired with latency-optimized AI/ML software that is suitable for real-time deployment.
output: 最近的研究已显示出将深度学习应用于无线电频率（RF）信号处理的巨大潜力。与此同时，基于里德堡原子的量子RF传感器的硬件进展正在突破频率范围、分辨率和灵敏度方面的长期限制。在本文中，我们详细介绍了针对RF信号分类的量子适用机器学习方法的实施。我们的主要目标是降低延迟：虽然深度学习提供了更为强大的计算模式，但它传统上也会带来延迟，这阻碍了其更广泛的应用。我们的研究主要围绕三个方向展开：（1）一种新颖的基于连续小波变换（CWT）的循环神经网络（RNN）架构，此架构可以灵活地实时在线对RF信号进行分类，并显著减少采样时间。（2）为GPU和CPU设计的低延迟推理技术，可减少超过100倍的推理时间，实现亚毫秒级的实时操作。（3）通过对基于里德堡原子的QRF传感器的物理仿真应用我们的模型，验证了其量子适用性。总体来看，我们的工作为利用量子技术突破传统物理限制的下一代RF传感器搭建了桥梁，同时配备了适合实时部署的、延迟优化的AI/ML软件。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: We used to love it. The Americans took it over and turned it into a disgusting bar of sickly-sweet cardboard. It's now tasteless and doesn't resemble chocolate in the slightest. I've no idea why they thought it would make good business sense to screw with a recipe perfected over decades (almost 2 centuries!). I can only imagine that they wanted to standardise the formula to sell across multiple markets - predominantly the US - but it's massively backfired. No one likes it now. Personally, I think they could've altered the recipe for Americans who seek cardboard chocolate and kept the original recipe for those around the world with functioning tastebuds, but hey, what do I know.
output: 我们曾非常喜欢这款产品。然而自从美国人接管后，它就变成了一种令人厌恶的、过于甜腻且类似纸板的食品。它现在完全没有味道，一点也不像巧克力了。我真不明白，他们为何会觉得破坏一个调制了近两个世纪、已臻完美的配方会是一个明智的商业决策。我猜想他们可能希望通过标准化配方来适应多个市场——主要是美国市场，但这一计划彻底失败了。现在没人喜欢它了。就我个人而言，我认为他们本可以专为喜欢这种纸板巧克力口感的美国人调整配方，而将原始配方保留给全球其他地区有正常味觉的人。但嘿，我又能知道什么呢。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: It became clear early in Thursday’s argument that there was little support across the bench for a narrow ruling that would be good for only this case. As Gorsuch put it at one point, the court needs to articulate “a rule for the ages.” Never mind that we’ve never had a criminal indictment of a former president before; the concern seems to be about the need to articulate a forward-looking rule so that future presidents will know when they should be worried about future criminal prosecution, and when they shouldn’t. Once the court articulates that rule, presumably, it would send Trump’s case back to the district court — where Judge Tanya Chutkan would be expected to apply it before proceeding to trial.
output: 在周四的辩论一开始就显而易见，法官们几乎没有人支持仅对本案有效的狭隘裁决。正如戈萨奇法官所言，法院需要制定一个能“经受时间考验”的规则。虽然我们以前从未遇到前总统面临刑事起诉的情况，但目前的关注点在于需要确立一个符合未来指导原则的规则，以便未来的总统能明确他们何时应当对刑事起诉保持警惕，何时则无需担忧。一旦法院确立了这一规则，推测其将会将特朗普的案件发回给地区法院——届时，预计坦妮娅·丘特坎法官需在审判开始前应用这一规则。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I was a guest relations manager at a fine dining restaurant when this happened. Apparently, a couple disappeared in the middle of their 4th course leaving half eaten food, wine & drinks. The captain in charge of their seating section was informed by their server who called for me after 20 minutes. They checked the wine bar where guests smoke, both restrooms & the private dining room but nothing. The hostess said she never saw them leave so it was a mystery. The restaurant manager decided to clear the table & classify it as a eat & run before I even arrived. Lo & behold, they reappeared just as I got there from my office. The couple actually decided to have a moment or moments in the family/handicapped restroom! No one thought to check there.
output: 这起事件发生时，我正担任一家高档餐厅的客户关系经理。一对夫妇在享用第四道菜的过程中突然消失，留下了吃剩的食物、酒水和饮料。负责该区域的领班在20分钟后接到服务员的通知，随即叫来了我。他们先后检查了客人吸烟的酒吧区、两个洗手间以及私人用餐室，却一无所获。接待员表示她没有看到他们离开，因此这成了一个谜团。而餐厅经理在我到达之前已决定清理这一桌并将此事件定性为“霸王餐”。然而就在我从办公室赶到餐厅的时候，他们突然又出现了。原来这对夫妇决定去家庭/残疾人洗手间中途休息。竟然没人想到去那儿查看。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: As the name suggests, these are meant to go the distance, and the buds boast up to 10 hours of battery power and an additional 40 in the case. That’s likely due to the lack of Active Noise Cancellation, which isn’t a necessity on the run. They do still feature JBL’s excellent Ambient Aware mode, which is more important when it comes to staying safe. The drawback for me was the size and weight of the Endurance Peak 3 earbuds. The speaker compartment is bulkier than any other headphone we tested, both in size and weight. A bendable ear hook helps keep them secure, but we didn’t love the sensation of wearing these for a two-hour run.
output: 正如其名，这些耳机旨在长时间使用，耳机本身可提供长达10小时的续航，充电盒还可额外提供40小时。这可能是因为它们不具备主动降噪功能，而在跑步时，主动降噪并非必需。它们还配备了JBL卓越的环境感知模式，这对保持安全来说更为关键。对我而言，Endurance Peak 3耳机的尺寸和重量较为不便。其扬声器部分的体积和重量均超过我们测试的所有其他耳机。可弯曲的耳钩确实有助于将耳机固定在耳朵上，但长时间佩戴这款耳机跑步的感受并不佳。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Bird eggs are usually laid in a nest. Most species create somewhat elaborate nests, which can be cups, domes, plates, mounds, or burrows. Some bird nests can be a simple scrape, with minimal or no lining; most seabird and wader nests are no more than a scrape on the ground. Most birds build nests in sheltered, hidden areas to avoid predation, but large or colonial birds—which are more capable of defence—may build more open nests. During nest construction, some species seek out plant matter from plants with parasite-reducing toxins to improve chick survival, and feathers are often used for nest insulation. Some bird species have no nests; the cliff-nesting common guillemot lays its eggs on bare rock, and male emperor penguins keep eggs between their body and feet. The absence of nests is especially prevalent in open habitat ground-nesting species where any addition of nest material would make the nest more conspicuous. Many ground nesting birds lay a clutch of eggs that hatch synchronously, with precocial chicks led away from the nests (nidifugous) by their parents soon after hatching.
output: 鸟蛋通常在巢中孵化。多数鸟类会构筑较为复杂的巢穴，形式包括杯状、圆顶状、盘状、堆状或洞穴式。有些鸟巢极为简陋，仅为地面的简单刮擦，几乎不添加任何内衬；大部分海鸟和涉水鸟的巢就是地面上的一处简单刮划。大多数鸟类选择在隐蔽且受保护的地方筑巢以避免天敌，而体型较大或群居的鸟类由于具备更强的防御能力，往往会筑造较为开放的巢穴。在筑巢过程中，一些鸟类会选用含有抗寄生虫毒素的植物材料以提高雏鸟存活率，而羽毛经常被用来作为巢的隔热材料。有些鸟类不筑巢；例如常见的海鸥在光秃的岩石上产蛋，而雄性帝企鹅则将蛋夹在其身体与脚之间保持温度。在开阔的地面筑巢物种中，巢的缺失尤为常见，因为任何额外的巢材都会使巢更加显眼。许多地面筑巢的鸟类会生下一窝能同时孵化的蛋，而这些早熟的雏鸟在孵化后不久便会在父母的带领下离开巢穴。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: About three-quarters of voters currently backing Trump against President Joe Biden in the 2024 election say they will stick with him even if he is convicted of a crime, while 24% of Trump’s backers say a conviction might cause them to reconsider their support. Trump is charged in four separate cases, and the survey question asked about being convicted of a crime without specifying a charge. The group that might reconsider amounts to about 12% of all registered voters in the poll, more than enough to make a difference in a close contest should he face conviction in any of the four trials he may face between now and Election Day.
output: 在2024年选举中，目前支持特朗普对抗乔·拜登的选民中，约有四分之三表示即便特朗普被定罪，他们也将继续支持他，而有24%的特朗普支持者表明，如果特朗普被定罪，他们可能会重新考虑自己的支持态度。特朗普目前面临四起不同的指控，而这项调查仅仅询问了关于“被定罪”这一情况，并未指明具体的罪名。那些可能会重新考虑支持的选民约占所有登记选民的12%，在竞选胶着的情况下，这个比例足以影响选举结果，尤其是如果特朗普在选举日前的任一审判中被判有罪的话。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: “The really cool thing that’s happened since the Beyoncé release is now we have this whole group of Black fans that have stepped forward and are starting to engage,” Holly G., who first launched the Black Opry in 2021 as a blog, told CNN. “I’m super, super excited about that because that’s the single piece that’s been really, really difficult for us to figure out. If and when we put Black artists on stage, whether it be at one of our shows or at any of the popular country music festivals, it’s still really difficult to Black people specifically to overlook the fact that the industry has told them that they don’t belong in these spaces and to want to come out and engage.”
output: “自从碧昂丝发布新作之后，真正让人兴奋的是，现在我们这个圈子中涌现出了一大批黑人粉丝，他们开始主动参与进来，”霍莉·G在2021年以博客的形式创立了Black Opry，并向CNN表示。“我对此感到非常兴奋，因为这恰恰是我们一直难以突破的一个重点。不论是在我们自己的演出中，还是在任何热门乡村音乐节上，当我们让黑人艺术家登上舞台时，对黑人来说，要他们忽视行业长久以来对他们的排斥——即他们不属于这些场合——并且愿意来参与，这依然是一个巨大的挑战。”

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Federated learning (FL) enables collaborative model training while preserving data privacy, making it suitable for decentralized human-centered AI applications. However, a significant research gap remains in ensuring fairness in these systems. Current fairness strategies in FL require knowledge of bias-creating/sensitive attributes, clashing with FL's privacy principles. Moreover, in human-centered datasets, sensitive attributes may remain latent. To tackle these challenges, we present a novel bias mitigation approach inspired by "Fairness without Demographics" in machine learning. The presented approach achieves fairness without needing knowledge of sensitive attributes by minimizing the top eigenvalue of the Hessian matrix during training, ensuring equitable loss landscapes across FL participants. Notably, we introduce a novel FL aggregation scheme that promotes participating models based on error rates and loss landscape curvature attributes, fostering fairness across the FL system. This work represents the first approach to attaining "Fairness without Demographics" in human-centered FL. Through comprehensive evaluation, our approach demonstrates effectiveness in balancing fairness and efficacy across various real-world applications, FL setups, and scenarios involving single and multiple bias-inducing factors, representing a significant advancement in human-centered FL.
output: 联邦学习（FL）支持多方在保护数据隐私的同时共同训练模型，非常适合去中心化的、以人为本的人工智能应用。然而，确保这些系统公平性的研究仍然存在显著空白。现有的FL公平性策略需要识别出造成偏见的敏感属性，这与FL的隐私保护原则相冲突。此外，在以人为本的数据集中，敏感属性往往是隐蔽的。为应对这些挑战，我们提出了一种新颖的偏见减轻方法，其灵感来自于机器学习中的“无人口统计公平性”。该方法通过在训练过程中最小化赫西矩阵的最大特征值，无需识别敏感属性即可实现公平性，确保所有FL参与者的损失景观公平一致。特别地，我们引入了一种新型FL聚合方案，根据模型的错误率和损失景观曲率特性来促进模型的参与，从而在整个FL系统中推动公平性。本项工作是首次在以人为本的FL中实现“无人口统计公平性”。通过全面的评估，我们的方法在多种实际应用、FL配置及涉及单个或多个偏见诱因的场景中证明了其在平衡公平性和效能方面的有效性，标志着以人为本的FL领域的重大进展。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Traditionally, natural language processing (NLP) models often use a rich set of features created by linguistic expertise, such as semantic representations. However, in the era of large language models (LLMs), more and more tasks are turned into generic, end-to-end sequence generation problems. In this paper, we investigate the question: what is the role of semantic representations in the era of LLMs? Specifically, we investigate the effect of Abstract Meaning Representation (AMR) across five diverse NLP tasks. We propose an AMR-driven chain-of-thought prompting method, which we call AMRCoT, and find that it generally hurts performance more than it helps. To investigate what AMR may have to offer on these tasks, we conduct a series of analysis experiments. We find that it is difficult to predict which input examples AMR may help or hurt on, but errors tend to arise with multi-word expressions, named entities, and in the final inference step where the LLM must connect its reasoning over the AMR to its prediction. We recommend focusing on these areas for future work in semantic representations for LLMs. Our code: https://github.com/causalNLP/amr_llm.
output: 传统上，自然语言处理（NLP）模型往往依赖于语言学专家创建的丰富特征集，例如语义表征。然而，在大型语言模型（LLM）的时代，越来越多的任务转变为通用的端到端序列生成问题。本文探讨了一个问题：在LLM时代，语义表征的作用是什么？具体而言，我们研究了抽象意义表示（AMR）在五种不同NLP任务中的效果。我们提出了一种基于AMR的思维链提示方法，称为AMRCoT，发现它通常对性能的负面影响大于积极作用。为了探索AMR在这些任务上可能带来的益处，我们进行了一系列分析实验。我们发现很难预测哪些输入示例会受AMR的帮助或损害，但错误往往出现在多词表达、命名实体以及LLM必须将其在AMR上的推理与预测联系起来的最终推理步骤中。我们建议未来在LLM的语义表征工作中重点关注这些领域。我们的代码：https://github.com/causalNLP/amr_llm.

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Early in his tenure, Jefferson was able to maintain cordial relations with both France and Britain, but relations with Britain deteriorated after 1805. The British ended their policy of tolerance towards American shipping and began seizing American goods headed for French ports. They also impressed American sailors, some of whom had originally defected from the British navy, but some of whom had never been British subjects. In response to the attacks, Congress passed the Non-importation Act, which restricted many, but not all, British imports. Tensions with Britain were heightened due to the "Chesapeake–Leopard" affair, a June 1807 naval confrontation between American and British naval forces, while the French also began attacking American shipping. Madison believed that economic pressure could force the British to end their seizure of American shipped goods, and he and Jefferson convinced Congress to pass the Embargo Act of 1807, which banned all exports to foreign nations. The embargo proved ineffective, unpopular, and difficult to enforce, especially in New England. In March 1809, Congress replaced the embargo with the Non-Intercourse Act, which allowed trade with nations other than Britain and France.
output: 杰斐逊在任职初期成功地与法国和英国保持了友好的关系，但自1805年起，与英国的关系开始恶化。英国停止了对美国航运的宽容政策，开始查扣前往法国港口的美国货物。他们还征用了美国水手，这其中不乏一些原来叛离英国海军的水手，也包括一些从未是英国公民的人。为应对这些侵扰，国会通过了《非进口法案》，限制了大量但并非全部的英国进口商品。1807年6月的“切萨皮克-豹号”事件，即美国与英国海军建立的海上对抗，使得两国间的紧张关系升级，法国也开始袭击美国航运。麦迪逊相信经济压力能迫使英国停止扣押美国船只的货物，他与杰斐逊一同说服国会通过了1807年的《禁运法案》，禁止向所有外国国家出口商品。结果，该禁运措施证明是无效的、不受欢迎的，并且在新英格兰地区尤其难以执行。1809年3月，国会废除了禁运法，通过了《非交往法案》，允许与英国和法国以外的其他国家进行贸易。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The current state-of-the-art theoretical analysis of Actor-Critic (AC) algorithms significantly lags in addressing the practical aspects of AC implementations. This crucial gap needs bridging to bring the analysis in line with practical implementations of AC. To address this, we advocate for considering the MMCLG criteria: Multi-layer neural network parametrization for actor/critic, Markovian sampling, Continuous state-action spaces, the performance of the Last iterate, and Global optimality. These aspects are practically significant and have been largely overlooked in existing theoretical analyses of AC algorithms. In this work, we address these gaps by providing the first comprehensive theoretical analysis of AC algorithms that encompasses all five crucial practical aspects (covers MMCLG criteria). We establish global convergence sample complexity bounds of $\tilde{\mathcal{O}}\left({\epsilon^{-3}}\right)$. We achieve this result through our novel use of the weak gradient domination property of MDP's and our unique analysis of the error in critic estimation.
output: 当前对演员-评论家（AC）算法的理论分析在处理其实际实施方面明显滞后。为了与AC的实际应用保持一致，弥合这一关键差距非常重要。为此，我们倡导考虑以下MMCLG标准：多层神经网络参数化的演员/评论家，马尔可夫采样，连续状态-动作空间，最终迭代的性能，以及全局最优。这些方面在实践中非常重要，但在现有的AC算法理论分析中基本被忽略。在本研究中，我们通过提出第一份涵盖所有五个关键实践方面（包括MMCLG标准）的AC算法全面理论分析，来填补这些空白。我们确定了全球收敛的样本复杂度界限为$\tilde{\mathcal{O}}\left({\epsilon^{-3}}\right)$。这一成果得益于我们对MDP弱梯度支配属性的新颖使用以及对评论家估计误差的独到分析。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Large Vision-Language models (VLMs) have demonstrated strong reasoning capabilities in tasks requiring a fine-grained understanding of literal images and text, such as visual question-answering or visual entailment. However, there has been little exploration of these models' capabilities when presented with images and captions containing figurative phenomena such as metaphors or humor, the meaning of which is often implicit. To close this gap, we propose a new task and a high-quality dataset: Visual Figurative Language Understanding with Textual Explanations (V-FLUTE). We frame the visual figurative language understanding problem as an explainable visual entailment task, where the model has to predict whether the image (premise) entails a claim (hypothesis) and justify the predicted label with a textual explanation. Using a human-AI collaboration framework, we build a high-quality dataset, V-FLUTE, that contains 6,027 <image, claim, label, explanation> instances spanning five diverse multimodal figurative phenomena: metaphors, similes, idioms, sarcasm, and humor. The figurative phenomena can be present either in the image, the caption, or both. We further conduct both automatic and human evaluations to assess current VLMs' capabilities in understanding figurative phenomena.
output: 大型视觉-语言模型（VLMs）已在需要精细理解图文的任务中，如视觉问答与视觉蕴含，展现出强大的推理能力。然而，对这类模型在面对含有隐喻或幽默等形象化语言现象的图像和文字时的能力研究仍较少，而这些现象的含义通常并不显而易见。为弥补这一研究空白，我们提出了一项新的任务和一个高质量数据集：视觉形象化语言理解及其文本解释（V-FLUTE）。我们将视觉形象化语言的理解问题定义为一个可解释的视觉蕴含任务，模型需预测图像（前提）是否支持某一断言（假设），并以文本形式解释其预测标签。通过人机协作框架，我们构建了包含6027个<图像，断言，标签，解释>实例的高质量数据集V-FLUTE，覆盖了五种多样的多模态形象化语言现象：隐喻、明喻、成语、讽刺和幽默。这些形象化语言现象可能出现在图像、文字标题中，或两者皆有。此外，我们还进行了自动化和人工评估，以评价当前VLMs在理解这些形象化语言现象方面的能力。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The Disk II single-sided floppy drive used 5.25-inch floppy disks; double-sided disks could be used, one side at a time, by turning them over and notching a hole for the write protect sensor. The first disk operating systems for the were and DOS 3.2, which stored 113.75 KB on each disk, organized into 35 tracks of 13 256-byte sectors each. After about two years, DOS 3.3 was introduced, storing 140 KB thanks to a minor firmware change on the disk controller that allowed it to store 16 sectors per track. (This upgrade was user-installable as two PROMs on older controllers.) After the release of DOS 3.3, the user community discontinued use of except for running legacy software. Programs that required DOS 3.2 were fairly rare; however, as DOS 3.3 was not a major architectural change aside from the number of sectors per track, a program called MUFFIN was provided with DOS 3.3 to allow users to copy files from DOS 3.2 disks to DOS 3.3 disks. It was possible for software developers to create a DOS 3.2 disk which would also boot on a system with firmware.
output: 磁盘 II 单面软驱使用 5.25 英寸软盘；而对于双面软盘，只需翻转并在写保护传感器处打孔后，就可以分别单面使用。最初，DOS 3.2 是为其开发的操作系统，每张磁盘能存储 113.75 KB 数据，分布在 35 条轨道上，每条轨道包含 13 个 256 字节的扇区。大约两年后，随着磁盘控制器的一个小型固件升级，DOS 3.3 被推出，该升级允许每条轨道存储 16 个扇区，从而将存储容量提升至 140 KB。（该升级可以通过在旧控制器上安装两个 PROMs 芯片来由用户自行实现。）发布 DOS 3.3 后，除了运行旧版软件外，用户社区基本停止使用旧版本操作系统。需要 DOS 3.2 的程序相当罕见；然而，由于 DOS 3.3 在架构上没有大的改变，仅在每轨扇区数上有所增加，因此提供了一个名为 MUFFIN 的工具，以便用户能够将文件从 DOS 3.2 磁盘复制至 DOS 3.3 磁盘。此外，软件开发者还可以创建能够在更新固件系统上启动的 DOS 3.2 磁盘。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: I was still working in the kitchen expecting guests in an hour when they called. And truly they weren’t good friends but I had asked them to dinner as they were in town for a week to see her parents and we’re our old neighbours. So there I was toiling away when they called from their car to say the wife was homesick for their dog so they decided to head home early. Oh, and would I mind scooting over to her Mom’s and pick up and mail her a couple of things she’d forgotten to pack. I wished them a safe trip home and said sorry we couldn’t get together. Hung up, called a friend and said surprise dinner party come on over. I never went to her Mom’s for the forgotten articles. Instead, I forgot about that couple altogether.
output: 我还在厨房里忙着准备，一个小时后客人就要来了，这时他们打来了电话。坦白说，他们并不算是很好的朋友，但既然他们来镇上看望她的父母，而且以前我们是邻居，我就邀请他们来吃晚餐。正当我忙碌时，他们从车上打来电话说妻子太想家了，特别是想念他们的狗，因此决定提前回家。他们还问我能否顺路到她妈妈家帮忙取几件她忘记带的物品并邮寄给她。我祝他们一路平安，遗憾我们未能见面。挂断电话后，我给朋友打了个电话，说有个惊喜晚宴，请他快来。最后，我根本没去她妈妈家拿那些忘记的东西。实际上，我已经把那对夫妇彻底忘记了。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: If I know one thing about my mom, it’s that I’ll be called in for tech support if anything goes wrong with her Kindle. Amazon’s long-lasting e-readers have earned the MVP slot in her heart and desk as a way to be easily connected to the world of words. Unfortunately, the world of Kindles has gotten a little odd lately, with four models of note that might confuse even veteran users. So, even though she doesn’t need a new Kindle — she’s trying to cut down on waste — I asked what features matter the most to her. It turns out that water resistance for pool season and automatically adjusting lighting for less fussing around matter the most to her. This means her next Kindle will be the Paperwhite Signature Edition, which I’ll gladly buy her. Its price includes an ad-free lock screen, and there’s no way I’d give my mom commercials for Mother’s Day. — Henry T. Casey, electronics writer
output: 如果说我对妈妈有什么了解，那就是只要她的Kindle出现任何故障，我肯定会被叫去提供技术支持。亚马逊耐用的电子阅读器已经赢得了她内心和书桌上的MVP地位，因为这使她能轻松连接到世界各地的文字。但不幸的是，最近Kindle的界面显得有些怪异，推出了四种令人眼花缭乱的新型号，可能连经验丰富的用户也会感到困惑。因此，尽管她并不需要一台新的Kindle — 她正在尽力减少浪费 — 我还是询问了哪些功能对她来说最为重要。结果，防水功能以适应泳池季节和自动调节灯光减少操作繁琐成为了她最关注的功能。这意味着她的下一台Kindle将是Paperwhite Signature版，我将很高兴为她购买。其价格已包含无广告锁屏，而我绝不会在母亲节给妈妈送去带广告的礼物。——亨利·T·凯西，电子产品评论作者

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Women in homosexual relationships in Europe and the United States responded to the discrimination and repression either by hiding their personal lives, or accepting the label of outcast and creating a subculture and identity. Following World War II, during a period of social repression when governments actively persecuted homosexuals, women developed networks to socialize with and educate each other. Gaining greater economic and social freedom allowed them to determine how they could form relationships and families. With second-wave feminism and the growth of scholarship in women's history and sexuality in the late 20th century, the definition of "lesbian" broadened, leading to debate about the term's use. While research by Lisa M. Diamond identified sexual desire as the core component for defining lesbians, some women who engage in same-sex sexual activity may reject not only identifying as lesbians but as bisexual as well. Other women's self-identification as lesbian may not align with their sexual orientation or sexual behavior. Sexual identity is not necessarily the same as one's sexual orientation or sexual behavior, due to various reasons, such as the fear of identifying their sexual orientation in a homophobic setting.
output: 在欧洲和美国，面对歧视和压迫，女同性恋者要么隐匿自己的个人生活，要么接受被视为边缘人的标签，并创造自己的亚文化与身份认同。第二次世界大战后，在社会压迫的背景下，政府积极迫害同性恋者，女性因此建立了网络以相互交流和启蒙。随着经济和社会自由度的提升，她们可以更自主地选择如何建立人际关系和家庭。进入20世纪后期，随着第二波女权主义的兴起和女性历史及性别研究的深入，对“女同性恋”定义的认识逐渐拓宽，引发了对此术语使用的广泛讨论。虽然丽莎·M·戴蒙德的研究认为性欲是定义女同性恋的核心要素，但一些有同性性行为的女性不仅可能拒绝被标识为女同性恋，也可能拒绝被认为是双性恋。还有些女性虽自我认同为女同性恋，但其性取向或性行为可能与此不符。性别身份不必然与某人的性取向或行为相同，这背后的原因多种多样，例如出于在恐同环境中的畏惧而不愿意公开自己的性取向。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: Thanks to Ajeet, thousands of girls lead a better life today. Ishita (name changed), a 17-year-old minor girl was kidnapped from near her house in Varanasi in 2009. She was taken to New Delhi by the traffickers and was raped repeatedly by numerous men inside a locked room. She was then taken to Surat and was gang raped for several days. Ishita’s horror did not end here. She was then taken to Mumbai where traffickers planned to sell her to a third party. This is when the Guria team intervened and rescued the girl from the claws of the traffickers. They did not just bring Ishita back to her family but also got the lead trafficker arrested and made sure his bail was rejected. The case is under trial in district court.
output: 据阿吉特的帮助，今天成千上万的女孩拥有了更好的生活。伊希塔（化名），一名17岁的未成年女孩，2009年在其位于瓦拉纳西的家附近被绑架。她被人贩子带到新德里，并在一间上锁的房间里遭多名男子多次强暴。接着，她被送往苏拉特，持续数日遭到轮暴。伊希塔的噩梦并未止步。随后，她被带到孟买，人贩子计划将她转卖给第三方。在此关键时刻，Guria团队介入，成功将她从人贩子的魔爪中救出。他们不仅安全将伊希塔送回家中，还抓捕了主要的人贩子，并确保其保释申请被拒绝。目前，此案正在地区法院审理中。

instruction: You are an expert translator and only output the result. Translate this from English to Chinese:
input: The Republicans opposed banks and cities and favored the series of unstable revolutionary governments in France. They built their own national coalition to oppose the Federalists.
